# Clarifai

AI-powered visual recognition

## Actions

### Add Inputs

Add inputs to your clarifai app

#### Input Parameters
- **userId**: `Text`
  User ID to associate with the input

- **appId**: `Text`
  App ID (project) to associate with the input

- **file**: `File`
  URL or base64 bytes of the audio to classify

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clarifai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "post_inputs",
    "input": {
      "userId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "appId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "file": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Classify Text

Call a text classifier AI model to recognize concepts

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clarifai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "text_classifier_model",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Ask LLM

The model which will generate the response. If the model is not listed, get the model id from the clarifai website. Example : 'GPT-4' you can get the model id from here [https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4](https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4

#### Input Parameters
- **models**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the response. If the model is not listed, get the model id from the clarifai website. Example : 'GPT-4' you can get the model id from here [https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4](https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4

- **prompt**: `Text`
  The prompt to send to the model.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clarifai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "ask-llm",
    "input": {
      "models": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Ask IGM

The model which will generate the response. If the model is not listed, get the model id from the clarifai website. Example : 'GPT-4' you can get the model id from here [https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4](https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4

#### Input Parameters
- **models**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the response. If the model is not listed, get the model id from the clarifai website. Example : 'GPT-4' you can get the model id from here [https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4](https://clarifai.com/openai/chat-completion/models/GPT-4

- **prompt**: `Text`
  The prompt to send to the model.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clarifai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "generate-igm",
    "input": {
      "models": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Anthropic Claude
## Actions

### Extract Structured Data

The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion, don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. The exact limit varies by model. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `StaticDropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion. Some models are suitable for natural language tasks, others specialize in code.

- **text**: `Text`
  Text to extract structured data from.

- **image**: `File`
  Image or PDF to extract structured data from.

- **prompt**: `Text`
  Prompt to guide the AI.

- **schema**: `DynamicProperties`

- **fields**: `JSON`
  Learn more about JSON Schema here: https://json-schema.org/learn/getting-started-step-by-step

- **fields**: `Array`

- **name**: `Text`
  Provide the name of the value you want to extract from the unstructured text. The name should be unique and short.

- **description**: `Text`
  Brief description of the data, this hints for the AI on what to look for

- **type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Type of parameter.

- **isRequired**: `Boolean`

- **maxTokens**: `Number`
  The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion, don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. The exact limit varies by model. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "anthropic-claude",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "extract-structured-data",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "schema": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "isRequired": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "maxTokens": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Ask Claude

Array of roles to specify more accurate response.Please check [guide to Input Messages](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/api/messages-examples#vision).

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `StaticDropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion. Some models are suitable for natural language tasks, others specialize in code.

- **systemPrompt**: `Text`

- **temperature**: `Number`
  Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

- **maxTokens**: `Number`
  The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion, don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. The exact limit varies by model. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

- **prompt**: `Text`

- **image**: `File`
  URL of image to be used as input for the model.

- **roles**: `JSON`
  Array of roles to specify more accurate response.Please check [guide to Input Messages](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/api/messages-examples#vision).

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "anthropic-claude",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "ask_claude",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "systemPrompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "temperature": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "maxTokens": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "roles": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

Gets a list in a ClickUp

#### Input Parameters
- **list_id**: `Text`
  The id of the list to get

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clickup",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_list",
    "input": {
      "list_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Spaces

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clickup",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_spaces",

    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},

      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },

  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
```

The new value to be set

```json

  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clickup",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "set_custom_fields_value",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clickup",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_accessible_custom_fields",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### Task Tag Updated

Triggered when a tag is added or removed or renamed on a task.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### 
```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Clockodo

Time tracking made easy

## Actions

### Update Absence

Updates an absence in clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **absence_id**: `Number`

- **date_since**: `DateTime`

- **date_until**: `DateTime`

- **status**: `StaticDropdown`

- **half_days**: `Boolean`

- **note**: `Text`

- **sick_note**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_absence",
    "input": {
      "absence_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date_since": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date_until": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "half_days": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sick_note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Absence

Retrieves a single absence from clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **absence_id**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_absence",
    "input": {
      "absence_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Absence

Creates a absence in clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **date_since**: `DateTime`

- **date_until**: `DateTime`

- **half_days**: `Boolean`

- **approved**: `Boolean`

- **note**: `Text`

- **sick_note**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_absence",
    "input": {
      "date_since": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date_until": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "half_days": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "approved": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sick_note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Update Entry

Updates an entry in clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **entry_id**: `Number`

- **time_since**: `DateTime`

- **time_until**: `DateTime`

- **text**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_entry",
    "input": {
      "entry_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "time_since": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "time_until": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Entries

Fetches entries from clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **time_since**: `DateTime`

- **time_until**: `DateTime`

- **user_id_filter**: `Number`
  Filter entries by their user

- **customer_id_filter**: `Number`
  Filter entries by their customer

- **project_id_filter**: `Number`
  Filter entries by their project

- **service_id_filter**: `Number`
  Filter entries by their service

- **billable_filter**: `Boolean`
  Only show entries that are billable

- **billed_filter**: `Boolean`
  Only show entries that are already billed

- **enhanced_list**: `Boolean`
  Retrieves additional information about the entries

- **page**: `Number`
  Reads only the specified page

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "list_entries",
    "input": {
      "time_since": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "time_until": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "user_id_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customer_id_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "project_id_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "service_id_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "billable_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "billed_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "enhanced_list": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Create User

Creates a user in clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`

- **email**: `Text`

- **role**: `Text`

- **number**: `Text`

- **wage_type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **can_generally_see_absences**: `Boolean`

- **can_generally_manage_absences**: `Boolean`

- **can_add_customers**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_user",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "role": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "wage_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "can_generally_see_absences": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "can_generally_manage_absences": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "can_add_customers": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Project

Creates a project in clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`

- **number**: `Text`

- **active**: `Boolean`

- **billable**: `Boolean`

- **budget**: `Number`

- **budget_is_hours**: `Boolean`

- **budget_is_not_strict**: `Boolean`

- **note**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_project",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "active": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "billable": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "budget": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "budget_is_hours": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "budget_is_not_strict": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_project",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Projects

Fetches projects from clockodo

#### Input Parameters
- **customer_id_filter**: `Number`
  Filter projects by their customer

- **active_filter**: `Boolean`
  Filter customers by their active status

- **page**: `Number`
  Reads only the specified page

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "clockodo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "list_projects",
    "input": {
      "customer_id_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "active_filter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Triggers

### New Absence Enquiry

Triggers when a new absence enquiry is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Entry

Triggers when a new time entry is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

# Constant Contact

Email marketing for small businesses

## Actions

### Create or Update Contact

Create or Update a contact in Constant Contact

#### Input Parameters
- **list**: `MultiSelectDropdown`
  The list of the contact

- **email_address**: `Text`
  The email of the contact

- **first_name**: `Text`
  The first name of the contact

- **last_name**: `Text`
  The last name of the contact

- **job_title**: `Text`
  The job title of the contact

- **company_name**: `Text`
  The company name of the contact

- **phoner_number**: `Text`
  The phone number of the contact

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "constant-contact",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_or_update_contact",
    "input": {
      "list": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email_address": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "first_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "last_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "job_title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "company_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phoner_number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Contiguity

An SMS service for your needs - quick and simple

## Actions

### Send SMS

Enter the recipient's phone number in international format with no spaces, following this pattern: [+][Country Code][Subscriber Number]. For example, +12065551234.

#### Input Parameters
- **to**: `Text`
  Enter the recipient's phone number in international format with no spaces, following this pattern: [+][Country Code][Subscriber Number]. For example, +12065551234.

- **message**: `Text`
  Message to send

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "contiguity",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_sms",
    "input": {
      "to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "message": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Triggers

### Tag added to subscriber

Trigger when a tag is added to a subscriber

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Crypto

Generate random passwords and hash existing text

## Actions

### Generate Password

Generates a random password with the specified length

#### Input Parameters
- **length**: `Number`
  The length of the password (maximum 256

- **characterSet**: `StaticDropdown`
  The character set to use when generating the password

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "crypto",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "generate-password",
    "input": {
      "length": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "characterSet": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Generate HMAC Signature

Converts text to a HMAC signed hash value using various hashing algorithms

#### Input Parameters
- **secretKey**: `Text`
  The secret key to encrypt

- **method**: `StaticDropdown`
  The hashing algorithm to use

- **text**: `Text`
  The text to be hashed and encrypted

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "crypto",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "hmac-signature",
    "input": {
      "secretKey": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "method": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

- **text**: `Text`
  The text to be hashed

```json

  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "crypto",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "hash-text",

      "method": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"

    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
```

# CSV

Manipulate CSV text

## Actions

### Convert CSV to JSON

This function reads a CSV string and converts it into JSON array format.

#### Input Parameters
- **csv_text**: `Text`

- **has_headers**: `Boolean`

- **delimiter_type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Select the delimiter type for the CSV text.

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "csv",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "convert_csv_to_json",
    "input": {
      "csv_text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "has_headers": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "delimiter_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Convert JSON to CSV

This function reads a JSON array and converts it into CSV format.

#### Input Parameters
- **markdown**: `MarkDown`

- **json_array**: `JSON`
  Provide a JSON array to convert to CSV format.

- **delimiter_type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Select the delimiter type for the CSV file.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "csv",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "convert_json_to_csv",
    "input": {
      "markdown": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "json_array": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "delimiter_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# customer.io

Create personalized journeys across all channels with our customer engagement platform.

## Actions

### Create Event

Create an event in Customer.io

#### Input Parameters
- **customer_identifier**: `Text`
  The unique value representing a person. You may identify a person by id, email address, or the cio_id (when updating people), depending on your workspace settings

- **event_name**: `Text`
  The name of the event. This is how you'll reference the event in campaigns or segments

- **body_type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Event information to be sent to Customer.io

- **body**: `DynamicProperties`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "customer.io",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_event",
    "input": {
      "customer_identifier": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "event_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "body_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "body": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Date Helper
## Actions

### Add/Subtract Time

Provide an expression to add or subtract using the following units (year , month , day , hour , minute or second). Examples: + 2 second + 1 hour + 1 year - 3 day - 2 month + 5 minute

#### Input Parameters
- **inputDate**: `Text`
  Enter the input date

- **inputDateFormat**: `StaticDropdown`

- **outputFormat**: `StaticDropdown`

- **expression**: `Text`
  Provide an expression to add or subtract using the following units (year , month , day , hour , minute or second). Examples: + 2 second + 1 hour + 1 year - 3 day - 2 month + 5 minute

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "date-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "add_subtract_date",
    "input": {
      "inputDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "inputDateFormat": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "outputFormat": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "expression": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Date Difference

Get the difference between two dates

#### Input Parameters
- **startDate**: `Text`
  Enter the starting date

- **startDateFormat**: `StaticDropdown`

- **endDate**: `Text`
  Enter the ending date

- **endDateFormat**: `StaticDropdown`

- **unitDifference**: `StaticMultiSelectDropdown`
  Select the unit of difference between the two dates

```json
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "date-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "date_difference",
    "input": {
      "startDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "startDateFormat": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "endDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "endDateFormat": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unitDifference": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",

}
```

### Extract Date Units

Extract date units ( year , month , day , hour , minute , second , day of week , month name ) from a date

#### Input Parameters

  Enter the input date

- **inputFormat**: `StaticDropdown`

- **unitExtract**: `StaticMultiSelectDropdown`
  Select the unit to extract from the date

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "date-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "extract_date_parts",
    "input": {
      "inputDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "inputFormat": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unitExtract": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },

    "type": "PIECE",

      }
    }
  }
```

---


### Next Day of Year

Get the date and time of the next day of the year

#### Input Parameters
- **month**: `StaticDropdown`
  The month that you would like to get the date and time of.

- **day**: `Number`
  The day of the month that you would like to get the date and time of.

- **time**: `Text`
  The time that you would like to get the date and time of. This must be in 24h format.

- **currentTime**: `Boolean`
  If checked, the current time will be used instead of the time specified above.

- **timeFormat**: `StaticDropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "date-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "next_day_of_year",
    "input": {
      "month": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "day": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "time": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currentTime": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timeFormat": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Dato CMS

Dato is a modern headless CMS


This piece has no actions or triggers available.




# DeepL

AI-powered language translation

## Actions

### Translate text

The automatic detection of the XML structure won't yield best results in all XML files.

#### Input Parameters
- **text**: `Text`
  Text to be translated. Only UTF-8-encoded plain text is supported.

- **target_lang**: `StaticDropdown`
  The language into which the text should be translated.

- **source_lang**: `StaticDropdown`
  Language of the text to be translated

- **split_sentences**: `StaticDropdown`
  Sets whether the translation engine should first split the input into sentences. For text translations where tag_handling is not set to html, the default value is 1, meaning the engine splits on punctuation and on newlines.

- **preserve_formatting**: `StaticDropdown`
  Sets whether the translation engine should respect the original formatting, even if it would usually correct some aspects.

- **formality**: `StaticDropdown`
  Sets whether the translated text should lean towards formal or informal language.

- **glossary_id**: `Text`
  Specify the glossary to use for the translation.

- **tag_handling**: `StaticDropdown`
  Sets which kind of tags should be handled.

- **outline_detection**: `StaticDropdown`
  The automatic detection of the XML structure won't yield best results in all XML files.

- **non_splitting_tags**: `Text`
  Comma-separated list of XML or HTML tags.

- **splitting_tags**: `Text`
  Comma-separated list of XML or HTML tags.

- **ignore_tags**: `Text`
  Comma-separated list of XML or HTML tags.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "deepl",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "translate_text",
    "input": {
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "target_lang": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "source_lang": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "split_sentences": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "preserve_formatting": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "formality": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "glossary_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tag_handling": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "outline_detection": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "non_splitting_tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "splitting_tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ignore_tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# Delay

Use it to delay the execution of the next action

## Actions

### Delay For

Delays the execution of the next action for a given duration

#### Input Parameters
- **markdown**: `MarkDown`

- **unit**: `StaticDropdown`
  The unit of time to delay the execution of the next action

- **delayFor**: `Number`
  The number of units to delay the execution of the next action

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "delay",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "delayFor",
    "input": {
      "markdown": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "delayFor": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Delay Until

Delays the execution of the next action until a given timestamp

#### Input Parameters
- **markdown**: `MarkDown`

- **delayUntilTimestamp**: `DateTime`
  Specifies the date and time until which the execution of the next action should be delayed. It supports multiple formats, including ISO format.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "delay",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "delay_until",
    "input": {
      "markdown": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "delayUntilTimestamp": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Send Message Webhook

Send a discord message via webhook

#### Input Parameters
- **webhook_url**: `Text`

- **username**: `Text`

- **content**: `Text`

- **avatar_url**: `Text`
  The avatar url for webhook

- **embeds**: `JSON`
  Embeds to send along with the message

- **tts**: `Boolean`
  Robot reads the message

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "discord",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_message_webhook",
    "input": {
      "webhook_url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "username": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "avatar_url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "embeds": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tts": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New message

Triggers when a message is sent in a channel

#### Input Parameters
- **limit**: `Number`
  The number of messages to fetch

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "limit": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Member

Triggers when a new member joins a guild

#### Input Parameters
- **limit**: `Number`
  The number of members to fetch (max 1000

- **guildId**: `Text`
  The ID of the Discord guild (server

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "limit": null,
      "guildId": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Discourse

Modern open source forum software

## Actions

### Send Private Message

Send a private message in Discourse

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`
  Title for the PM

- **raw**: `Text`
  Content of the post

- **target_recipients**: `Array`
  List of users to send the PM to (can be one or more

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "discourse",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_private_message",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "raw": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "target_recipients": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
    "pieceName": "discourse",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "raw": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "category": "{previousStep.output_field}"

    "inputUiInfo": {},

      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }

    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
```

```json
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
```

## Triggers

### Tag Applied

Triggers when a tag is applied.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Subscriber

Triggers when a subscriber is created in your Drip account.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Dropbox

Cloud storage and file synchronization

## Actions

### Copy folder

If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid conflict.

#### Input Parameters
- **from_path**: `Text`
  The source path of the folder (e.g. /folder1/sourceFolder

- **to_path**: `Text`
  The destination path for the copied folder (e.g. /folder2/destinationFolder

- **autorename**: `Boolean`
  If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid conflict.

- **allow_ownership_transfer**: `Boolean`
  Allows copy by owner even if it would result in an ownership transfer.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dropbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "copy_dropbox_folder",
    "input": {
      "from_path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "to_path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "autorename": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "allow_ownership_transfer": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create New Folder

If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid the conflict. The default for this field is False.

#### Input Parameters
- **path**: `Text`
  The path of the new folder e.g. /Homework/math

- **autorename**: `Boolean`
  If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid the conflict. The default for this field is False.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dropbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_new_dropbox_folder",
    "input": {
      "path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "autorename": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Move file

If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the file to avoid conflict.

#### Input Parameters
- **from_path**: `Text`
  The current path of the file (e.g. /folder1/oldfile.txt

- **to_path**: `Text`
  The new path for the file (e.g. /folder2/newfile.txt

- **autorename**: `Boolean`
  If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the file to avoid conflict.

- **allow_ownership_transfer**: `Boolean`
  Allows moves by owner even if it would result in an ownership transfer.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dropbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "move_dropbox_file",
    "input": {
      "from_path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "to_path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "autorename": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "allow_ownership_transfer": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Upload file

If there's a conflict, as determined by mode, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the file to avoid conflict.

#### Input Parameters
- **path**: `Text`
  The path where the file should be saved (e.g. /folder1/file.txt

- **file**: `File`
  The file URL or base64 to upload

- **autorename**: `Boolean`
  If there's a conflict, as determined by mode, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the file to avoid conflict.

- **mute**: `Boolean`
  Normally, users are made aware of any file modifications in their Dropbox account via notifications in the client software. If true, this tells the clients that this modification shouldn't result in a user notification.

- **strict_conflict**: `Boolean`
  Be more strict about how each WriteMode detects conflict. For example, always return a conflict error when mode = WriteMode.update and the given "rev" doesn't match the existing file's "rev", even if the existing file has been deleted.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dropbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "upload_dropbox_file",
    "input": {
      "path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "file": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "autorename": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mute": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "strict_conflict": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### List a folder

List the contents of a folder

#### Input Parameters
- **path**: `Text`
  The path of the folder to be listed (e.g. /folder1). Use an empty string for the root folder.

- **recursive**: `Boolean`
  If set to true, the list folder operation will be applied recursively to all subfolders and the response will contain contents of all subfolders.

- **limit**: `Number`
  The maximum number of results to return (between 1 and 2000). Default is 2000 if not specified.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dropbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "list_dropbox_folder",
    "input": {
      "path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "recursive": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Search

Search for files and folders

#### Input Parameters
- **query**: `Text`
  The search string. Must be at least 3 characters.

- **path**: `Text`
  The path to search in. If not specified, the search is performed from the root.

- **max_results**: `Number`
  The maximum number of search results to return (up to 1000). Default is 100 if not specified.

- **order_by**: `StaticDropdown`
  Specified property of the order of search results.

- **file_status**: `StaticDropdown`
  Restricts search to the given file status.

- **filename_only**: `Boolean`
  Restricts search to only match on filenames.

- **file_extensions**: `Text`
  Restricts search to only the extensions specified (comma-separated).

- **file_categories**: `Text`
  Restricts search to only the file categories specified (comma-separated).

- **account_id**: `Text`
  Restricts results to the given account id.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dropbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "search_dropbox",
    "input": {
      "query": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "max_results": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "order_by": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "file_status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "filename_only": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "file_extensions": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "file_categories": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "account_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create New Text File

If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid the conflict. The default for this field is False.

#### Input Parameters
- **path**: `Text`
  The path of the new folder e.g. /Homework/math

- **text**: `Text`
  The text to write into the file.

- **autorename**: `Boolean`
  If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid the conflict. The default for this field is False.

- **mute**: `Boolean`
  Normally, users are made aware of any file modifications in their Dropbox account via notifications in the client software. If true, this tells the clients that this modification shouldn't result in a user notification.

- **strict_conflict**: `Boolean`
  Be more strict about how each WriteMode detects conflict. For example, always return a conflict error when mode = WriteMode.update and the given "rev" doesn't match the existing file's "rev", even if the existing file has been deleted.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dropbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_new_dropbox_text_file",
    "input": {
      "path": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "autorename": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mute": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "strict_conflict": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Dust

### Get existing conversation

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dust",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "getConversation",
    "input": {
      "conversationSid": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create conversation

Create a new conversation with a specific Dust assistant

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dust",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createConversation",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",

        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Reply to conversation

#### Input Parameters

- **query**: `Text`

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dust",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "replyToConversation",
    "input": {
      "conversationId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "query": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Add fragment to conversation

Create a new content fragment in a conversation. Content fragments are pieces of information that can be inserted in conversations and are passed as context to assistants to when they generate an answer.

#### Input Parameters
- **conversationId**: `Text`

- **fragment**: `File`

- **fragmentName**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dust",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addFragmentToConversation",
    "input": {
      "conversationId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fragment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fragmentName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Add or update document

Insert a new document to a Data Source (or update an existing one

#### Input Parameters
- **datasource**: `Text`

- **documentId**: `Text`
  The ID of the document you want to insert or replace

- **content**: `Text`
  The text content of the document

- **sourceUrl**: `Text`
  The source URL of the document (when cited

- **title**: `Text`
  User-friendly title of the document

- **tags**: `Array`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "dust",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addDocument",
    "input": {
      "datasource": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "documentId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sourceUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
    "pieceName": "elevenlabs",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

    "input": {
      "voice": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
```

# Facebook Leads

Capture leads from Facebook

## Triggers

### New Lead

Triggers when a new lead is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "APP_WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

## Triggers

### New Comment (Figma Professional plan only

Triggers when a new comment is posted

#### Input Parameters
- **team_id**: `Text`
  Naviate to team page, copy the Id from the URL after the word team/

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "team_id": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Files Helper

Read file content and return it in different formats.

## Actions

### Change File Encoding

Changes the encoding of a file

#### Input Parameters
- **inputFile**: `File`

- **inputEncoding**: `StaticDropdown`

- **outputFileName**: `Text`

- **outputEncoding**: `StaticDropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "files-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "change_file_encoding",
    "input": {
      "inputFile": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "inputEncoding": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "outputFileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "outputEncoding": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create file

Create file from content

#### Input Parameters
- **content**: `Text`

- **fileName**: `Text`

- **encoding**: `StaticDropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "files-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createFile",
    "input": {
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "encoding": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Read File

Read a file from the file system

#### Input Parameters
- **file**: `File`

- **readOptions**: `StaticDropdown`
  The output format

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "files-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "read_file",
    "input": {
      "file": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "readOptions": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Formbricks

Open source Survey Platform

## Triggers

### Survey

A selection of surveys that will trigger. Else, all surveys will trigger.

#### Input Parameters
- **survey_id**: `MultiSelectDropdown`
  A selection of surveys that will trigger. Else, all surveys will trigger.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "survey_id": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Human Input

Trigger a flow through human input.

## Actions

### Respond on UI

Return a file or text (markdown) as a response.

#### Input Parameters
- **markdown**: `Text`

- **file**: `File`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "human-input",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "return_response",
    "input": {
      "markdown": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "file": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### Chat UI

Trigger the flow by sending a message

#### Input Parameters
- **about**: `MarkDown`

- **responseMarkdown**: `MarkDown`

- **botName**: `Text`
  The name of the chatbot

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "about": null,
      "responseMarkdown": null,
      "botName": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### Web Form

Trigger the flow by submitting a form.

#### Input Parameters
- **about**: `MarkDown`

- **response**: `MarkDown`

- **waitForResponse**: `Boolean`

- **inputs**: `Array`

- **displayName**: `Text`

- **type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **description**: `Text`

- **required**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "about": null,
      "response": null,
      "waitForResponse": null,
      "inputs": null,
      "displayName": null,
      "type": null,
      "description": null,
      "required": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

```json
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "account_id": null,
      "team_id": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Freshdesk

Customer support software

## Actions

```json

  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "freshdesk",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_tickets",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Freshdesk Contacts

Get contact details from Freshdesk for all (optional filtered) contacts.

#### Input Parameters
- **filter_type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Select one and provide the value.

- **filter_value**: `Text`
  Provide value if previous option selected!

- **filter_status**: `StaticDropdown`
  Can filter by state: blocked, deleted, unverified or verified.

- **per_page**: `Number`
  Freshdesk calls this per_page - set to 0 for all, if specified maximum is 100

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "freshdesk",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_contacts",
    "input": {
      "filter_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "filter_value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "filter_status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "per_page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

#### Input Parameters
- **contactid**: `Text`
  The ID number of the contact

```json
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "freshdesk",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_contact_from_id",
    "input": {
      "contactid": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Freshsales

Sales CRM software

## Actions

### Create Contact

Add new contact in Freshsales CRM

#### Input Parameters
- **first_name**: `Text`
  First name of the contact

- **last_name**: `Text`
  Last name of the contact

- **job_title**: `Text`
  Designation of the contact in the account they belong to

- **email**: `Text`
  Primary email address of the contact

- **work_number**: `Text`
  Work phone number of the contact

- **mobile_number**: `Text`
  Mobile phone number of the contact

- **address**: `Text`
  Address of the contact

- **city**: `Text`
  City that the contact belongs to

- **state**: `Text`
  State that the contact belongs to

- **zipcode**: `Text`
  Zipcode of the region that the contact belongs to

- **country**: `Text`
  Country that the contact belongs to

- **territory_id**: `Text`
  ID of the territory that the contact belongs to

- **owner_id**: `Text`
  ID of the user to whom the contact has been assigned

- **subscription_status**: `Text`
  Status of subscription that the contact is in.

- **medium**: `Text`
  The medium that led your contact to your website/web app

- **campaign_id**: `Text`
  The campaign that led your contact to your web app.

- **keyword**: `Text`
  The keywords that the contact used to reach your website/web app

- **time_zone**: `Text`
  Timezone that the contact belongs to

- **facebook**: `Text`
  Facebook username of the contact

- **twitter**: `Text`
  Twitter username of the contact

- **linkedin**: `Text`
  LinkedIn account of the contact

- **contact_status_id**: `Text`
  ID of the contact status that the contact belongs to

- **sales_account_id**: `Text`
  ID of the primary account that the contact belongs to

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "freshsales",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "freshsales_create_contact",
    "input": {
      "first_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "last_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "job_title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "work_number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mobile_number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "address": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "city": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "state": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "zipcode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "country": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "territory_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "owner_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "subscription_status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "medium": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "campaign_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "keyword": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "time_zone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "facebook": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "twitter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "linkedin": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contact_status_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sales_account_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
      "ackDeadlineSeconds": null,
```
