# Gistly

YouTube Transcripts

## Actions

### Get Transcript

Fetches transcript of a YouTube video.

#### Input Parameters
- **url**: `Text`

- **text**: `Boolean`
  If true, the transcript will be merged into a single text instead of timestamped chunks.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "gistly",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_transcript",
    "input": {
      "url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
  "valid": true,

    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
```

```json
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create comment on a issue

Adds a comment to the specified issue (also works with pull requests

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "github",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createCommentOnAIssue",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },

      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",

          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

```json
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "gmail",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "gmail_search_mail",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Thread

Get a thread from your Gmail account via Id

#### Input Parameters
- **thread_id**: `Text`
  The thread Id of the mail to read

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "gmail",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "gmail_get_thread",
    "input": {
      "thread_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Email

Get an email from your Gmail account via Id

#### Input Parameters
- **message_id**: `Text`
  The messageId of the mail to read

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "gmail",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "gmail_get_mail",
    "input": {
      "message_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Send Email

The address must be listed in your GMail account's settings

#### Input Parameters
- **receiver**: `Array`

- **cc**: `Array`

- **bcc**: `Array`

- **subject**: `Text`

- **body_type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **body**: `Text`
  Body for the email you want to send

- **reply_to**: `Array`
  Email address to set as the "Reply-To" header

- **sender_name**: `Text`

- **from**: `Text`
  The address must be listed in your GMail account's settings

- **attachment**: `File`
  File to attach to the email you want to send

- **attachment_name**: `Text`
  In case you want to change the name of the attachment

- **in_reply_to**: `Text`
  Reply to this Message-ID

- **draft**: `Boolean`
  Create draft without sending the actual email

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "gmail",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_email",
    "input": {
      "receiver": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cc": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bcc": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "subject": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "body_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "body": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "reply_to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sender_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "attachment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "attachment_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "in_reply_to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "draft": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New Labeled Email

Triggers when a label is added to an email

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

```json
    "type": "POLLING",
```

# Google Calendar

Get organized and stay on schedule

## Actions

### Create Event

By default it'll be 30 min post start time

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-calendar",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_google_calendar_event",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
  "valid": true,

    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",

      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }

  "nextAction": {

}
```

### Get all Events

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-calendar",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "google_calendar_get_events",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Google Docs

Create and edit documents online

## Actions

### Read Document

Read a document from Google Docs

#### Input Parameters
- **documentId**: `Text`
  The ID of the document to read

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-docs",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "read_document",
    "input": {
      "documentId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Append text to google docs

Appends text to google docs

#### Input Parameters
- **text**: `Text`
  The text to append to the document

- **documentId**: `Text`
  The ID of the document to append text to

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-docs",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "append_text",
    "input": {
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "documentId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Find Document

Search for document by name.

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-docs",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "google-docs-find-document",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Document

Create a document on Google Docs

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-docs",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_document",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Edit template file

Edit a template file and replace the values with the ones provided

#### Input Parameters
- **template**: `Text`
  The ID of the file to replace the values

- **values**: `Object`
  Dont include the "[[]]", only the key name and its value

- **images**: `Object`
  Key: Image ID (get it manually from the Read File Action), Value: Image URL

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-docs",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_document_based_on_template",
    "input": {
      "template": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "values": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "images": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Google Forms

## Triggers

### New Response

Triggers when there is new response

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Google Gemini

Use the new Gemini models from Google

## Actions

### Generate Content from Image

Generate content using Google Gemini using the "gemini-pro-vision" model

#### Input Parameters
- **prompt**: `Text`
  The prompt to generate content from.

- **image**: `File`
  The image to generate content from.

- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-gemini",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "generate_content_from_image",
    "input": {
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Generate Content

Generate content using Google Gemini using the "gemini-pro" model

#### Input Parameters
- **prompt**: `Text`
  The prompt to generate content from.

- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-gemini",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "generate_content",
    "input": {
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Chat Gemini

Chat with Google Gemini

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion

- **prompt**: `Text`
  The prompt to generate content from.

- **memoryKey**: `Text`
  A memory key that will keep the chat history. Keep it empty to leave Gemini without memory of previous messages.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-gemini",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "chat_gemini",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "memoryKey": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# Google My Business

Manage your business on Google

## Actions

### Create or Update Reply

Create or update a reply to a review if it already exists

#### Input Parameters
- **reviewName**: `Text`
  You can find the review name from new review trigger

- **comment**: `Text`
  Comment to be added to the review

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-my-business",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-reply",
    "input": {
      "reviewName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New Review

Triggers when there is new review

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Google Sheets

Create, edit, and collaborate on spreadsheets online

## Actions

### Create Spreadsheet

Creates a blank spreadsheet.

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`
  The title of the new spreadsheet.

- **folder**: `Dropdown`
  The folder to create the worksheet in.By default, the new worksheet is created in the root folder of drive.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "google-sheets",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-spreadsheet",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "folder": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
```

## Triggers

### New or Updated Row

Trigger on changes to cells in this column only.Select **All Columns** if you want the flow to trigger on changes to any cell within the row.

#### Input Parameters
- **info**: `MarkDown`

- **trigger_column**: `Dropdown`
  Trigger on changes to cells in this column only.Select **All Columns** if you want the flow to trigger on changes to any cell within the row.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "info": null,
      "trigger_column": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Row Added

Triggers when a new row is added to bottom of a spreadsheet.

#### Input Parameters
- **info**: `MarkDown`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "info": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Gotify

Self-hosted push notification service

## Actions

### Send Notification

Send a notification to gotify

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`
  The title of the notification

- **message**: `Text`
  The message to send

- **priority**: `Number`
  The priority of the notification (0-10). 0 is lowest priority.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "gotify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_notification",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "message": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "priority": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# Gravity Forms

Build and publish your WordPress forms

## Triggers

### New Submission

Triggers when form receives a new submission

#### Input Parameters
- **md**: `MarkDown`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "md": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Grist

open source spreadsheet

## Actions

### Update Record

Updates an existing record in specific table.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "grist",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "grist-update-record",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Triggers

### New Record

Triggers when a new record is added to the table.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### Updated Record

Triggers when a record is updated in the table.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Hacker News

# Harvest

Time Tracking Software with Invoicing

## Actions

### Get Users

Fetches Users

#### Input Parameters
- **is_active**: `Text`
  Pass `true` to only return active users and `false` to return inactive users.

- **updated_since**: `Text`
  Only return users that have been updated since the given date and time.

- **page**: `Text`
  DEPRECATED: The page number to use in pagination.

- **per_page**: `Text`
  The number of records to return per page. (1-2000

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "harvest",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_users",
    "input": {
      "is_active": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "updated_since": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "per_page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Uninvoiced Report

Uninvoiced hours and expenses for all billable projects

#### Input Parameters
- **from**: `Text`
  Only report on time entries and expenses with a spent_date on or after the given date. (YYYY-MM-DD

- **to**: `Text`
  Only report on time entries and expenses with a spent_date on or before the given date. (YYYY-MM-DD

- **include_fixed_fee**: `Text`
  Whether or not to include fixed-fee projects in the response. (Default: true

- **page**: `Text`
  The page number to use in pagination.

- **per_page**: `Text`
  The number of records to return per page. (1-2000

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "harvest",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "reports-uninvoiced",
    "input": {
      "from": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "include_fixed_fee": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "per_page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Clients

Fetches Clients

#### Input Parameters
- **is_active**: `Text`
  Pass `true` to only return active clients and `false` to return inactive clients.

- **updated_since**: `Text`
  Only return clients that have been updated since the given date and time.

- **page**: `Text`
  DEPRECATED: The page number to use in pagination.

- **per_page**: `Text`
  The number of records to return per page. (1-2000

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "harvest",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_clients",
    "input": {
      "is_active": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "updated_since": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "per_page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Heartbeat

Monitoring and alerting made easy

## Actions

### Create User

The user's full name

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`
  The user's full name

- **email**: `Text`
  The user's email. Must be unique to the community

- **role_id**: `Dropdown`
  The role the user should have

- **group_ids**: `MultiSelectDropdown`
  A list of the ids of the groups that the user should belong to.

- **profile_picture**: `Text`
  A Data URI scheme in the JPG, GIF, or PNG format. Ensure you use the proper content type (image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif) that matches the image data being provided

- **bio**: `Text`
  The user's bio

- **status**: `Text`
  The user's status

- **linkedin**: `Text`
  A link to the user's LinkedIn profile

- **twitter**: `Text`
  A link to the user's Twitter profile

- **instagram**: `Text`
  A link to the user's Instagram profile

- **create_introduction_thread**: `Boolean`
  If true and a value for bio is provided, an introduction thread for the user will be created in the channel designated for introductions in your community settings.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "heartbeat",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "heartbeat_create_user",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "role_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "group_ids": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "profile_picture": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bio": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "linkedin": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "twitter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "instagram": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "create_introduction_thread": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",

    "input": {
```
```json
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",

      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
```

### Create Line Item

Creates a line item in Hubspot.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "hubspot",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-line-item",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }

```

### Create or Update Contact

Creates a new contact or updates an existing contact based on email address.

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "hubspot",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-or-update-contact",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
      "markdown": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },

      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Image AI
## Actions

### Generate Image
```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "image-ai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "generateImage",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# Image Helper

Tools for image manipulations

## Actions

### Rotate an image

Rotates an image

#### Input Parameters
- **image**: `File`

- **degree**: `StaticDropdown`
  Specifies the degree of clockwise rotation applied to the image.

- **resultFileName**: `Text`
  Specifies the output file name for the result image (without extension).

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "image-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "rotate_image",
    "input": {
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "degree": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resultFileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get image metadata

Gets metadata from an image

#### Input Parameters
- **image**: `File`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "image-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_meta_data",
    "input": {
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Resize an image

Resizes an image

#### Input Parameters
- **image**: `File`

- **width**: `Number`
  Specifies the width of the image.

- **height**: `Number`
  Specifies the height of the image.

- **aspectRatio**: `Boolean`

- **resultFileName**: `Text`
  Specifies the output file name for the result image (without extension).

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "image-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "resize_image",
    "input": {
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "width": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "height": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "aspectRatio": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resultFileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Image to Base64

Converts an image to an url-like Base64 string

#### Input Parameters
- **image**: `File`
  The image to convert

- **override_mime_type**: `Text`
  The mime type to use when converting the image. In case you want to override the default mime type. Example image/png

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "image-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "image_to_base64",
    "input": {
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "override_mime_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Compresses an image

Compresses an image

#### Input Parameters
- **image**: `File`

- **quality**: `StaticDropdown`
  Specifies the quality of the image after compression (0-100).

- **format**: `StaticDropdown`
  Specifies the format of the image after compression.

- **resultFileName**: `Text`
  Specifies the output file name for the result image (without extension).

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "image-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "compress_image",
    "input": {
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quality": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "format": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resultFileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Crop an image

Crops an image

#### Input Parameters
- **image**: `File`

- **left**: `Number`
  Specifies the horizontal position, indicating where the cropping starts from the left side of the image.

- **top**: `Number`
  Represents the vertical position, indicating the starting point from the top of the image.

- **width**: `Number`
  Determines the horizontal size of the cropped area.

- **height**: `Number`
  Determines the vertical size of the cropped area.

- **resultFileName**: `Text`
  Specifies the output file name for the cropped image (without extension).

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "image-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "crop_image",
    "input": {
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "left": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "top": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "width": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "height": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resultFileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json

    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Instasent
## Actions

### Add Event

${param.description} (Max ${param.multiValue} values

#### Input Parameters
- **user_id**: `Text`
  Unique identifier of the user

- **event_id**: `Text`
  Unique identifier for this event. Used for deduplication.

- **event_date**: `Text`
  Date and time when the event occurred, will default to now (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSSZ

- **event_type**: `Dropdown`
  Select the type of event to create

- **event_parameters**: `DynamicProperties`
  ${param.description} (Max ${param.multiValue} values

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "instasent",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "add_event",
    "input": {
      "user_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "event_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "event_date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "event_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "event_parameters": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Add/Update contact

${description} (Max ${spec.multivalue} values

#### Input Parameters
- **contact**: `DynamicProperties`
  ${description} (Max ${spec.multivalue} values

- **instant**: `Boolean`
  Process contact immediately instead of queuing. Only enable this when you need to add an event for this contact in the next step. Not recommended for high-volume operations.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "instasent",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "add_or_update_contact",
    "input": {
      "contact": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "instant": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
    "pieceName": "instasent",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "delete_contact",
    "input": {
      "userId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
```

# Intercom

Customer messaging platform for sales, marketing, and support

## Actions

### Find Conversation

Searches for conversations using various criteria

#### Input Parameters
- **searchField**: `StaticDropdown`

- **matchType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **searchTerm**: `Text`

- **status**: `StaticDropdown`

- **updateAfter**: `DateTime`

- **updateBefore**: `DateTime`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "intercom",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "find-conversation",
    "input": {
      "searchField": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "matchType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "searchTerm": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "updateAfter": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "updateBefore": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get or Create Contact

Get or create a contact (ie. user or lead) if it isn't found

#### Input Parameters
- **role**: `StaticDropdown`

- **email**: `Text`

- **external_id**: `Text`

- **name**: `Text`

- **phone**: `Text`

- **avatar**: `Text`
  An image URL containing the avatar of a contact

- **custom_attributes**: `Object`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "intercom",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_or_create_contact",
    "input": {
      "role": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "external_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "avatar": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "custom_attributes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Send Message

Send a message to a contact (only allowed by admins

#### Input Parameters
- **message_type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **email_required_fields**: `DynamicProperties`

- **subject**: `Text`
  Email title

- **template**: `StaticDropdown`
  Style of the email

- **body**: `Text`

- **create_conversation_without_contact_reply**: `Boolean`
  Whether a conversation should be opened in the inbox for the message without the contact replying. Defaults to false if not provided.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "intercom",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_message",
    "input": {
      "message_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email_required_fields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "subject": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "template": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "body": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "create_conversation_without_contact_reply": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Invoice Ninja

Free open-source invoicing tool

## Actions

### Create Invoice

Creates an invoice in Invoice Ninja for billing purposes.

#### Input Parameters
- **client_id**: `Text`
  Client ID from Invoice Ninja

- **purchase_order_no**: `Text`
  Descriptive text or arbitrary number (optional

- **discount**: `Text`
  Enter a number for the whole invoice discount

- **discount_type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Select either amount or percentage for invoice discount. Applies to line items and invoice.

- **public_notes**: `Text`
  Text that may be visible in the client portal (optional

- **private_notes**: `Text`
  Text not visible for clients (optional

- **order_items_json**: `Text`
  e.g., [{ "quantity":1,"product_key":"product key", "discount": "0" }]

- **send_email**: `Boolean`
  Should we send the invoice to the client on creation?

- **mark_sent**: `Boolean`
  Makes the invoice active otherwise remains pending.

- **due_date**: `DateTime`
  e.g., 2024-01-20

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "invoice-ninja",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_invoice",
    "input": {
      "client_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "purchase_order_no": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "discount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "discount_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "public_notes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "private_notes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "order_items_json": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "send_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mark_sent": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "due_date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Client

Creates a new client in InvoiceNinja.

#### Input Parameters
- **client_first_name**: `Text`
  The contact first name for this client (optional

- **client_last_name**: `Text`
  The contact last name for this client (optional

- **client_phone**: `Text`
  The contact number for this client (optional

- **client_email**: `Text`
  The contact email for this client (compulsory

- **client_send_email**: `Boolean`
  Should we send invoices to the client by e-mail?

- **client_business_name**: `Text`
  Name of this business or natural person (compulsory

- **client_tax_no**: `Text`
  Leave blank if not a business (optional

- **client_private_notes**: `Text`
  Text not visible for clients (optional

- **client_address1**: `Text`
  Usually street name and number (compulsory

- **client_address2**: `Text`
  Additional address details (optional

- **client_city**: `Text`
  City or Town name (compulsory

- **client_state**: `Text`
  State or county or similar (optional

- **client_postcode**: `Text`
  Postal code (optional

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "invoice-ninja",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_client",
    "input": {
      "client_first_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_last_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_phone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_send_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_business_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_tax_no": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_private_notes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_address1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_address2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_city": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_state": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_postcode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Perform Action on Recurring Invoice

Actions include: start, stop, send_now, restore, archive, delete.

#### Input Parameters
- **recurring_id**: `Text`
  Recurring Invoice ID from Invoice Ninja

- **actionRecurring**: `StaticDropdown`
  Choose one

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "invoice-ninja",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "action_recurring_invoice",
    "input": {
      "recurring_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "actionRecurring": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Task

Creates a task instance in Invoice Ninja for billing purposes.

#### Input Parameters
- **number**: `Text`
  A unique task or ticket number that has not been used before in Invoice Ninja

- **client_id**: `Text`
  Client ID from Invoice Ninja (optional

- **project_id**: `Text`
  Project ID from Invoice Ninja (optional

- **description**: `Text`
  Description of task to be billed

- **rate**: `Number`
  Custom hourly rate (optional) otherwise default used

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "invoice-ninja",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_task",
    "input": {
      "number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "client_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "project_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "rate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "invoice-ninja",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "exists_task",
    "input": {
      "number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
```

### Search Issues

- **jql**: `Text`
  The JQL query to use in the search

- **maxResults**: `Number`

- **sanitizeJql**: `Boolean`

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "jira-cloud",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "search_issues",
    "input": {
      "jql": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "maxResults": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sanitizeJql": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,

      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
```

## Triggers

### New Issue

Triggers when a new issue is created

#### Input Parameters
- **jql**: `Text`
  Use to filter issues watched

- **sanitizeJql**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "jql": null,
      "sanitizeJql": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### Updated Issue

Triggers when an issue is updated

#### Input Parameters
- **jql**: `Text`
  Use to filter issues watched

- **sanitizeJql**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "jql": null,
      "sanitizeJql": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

```json
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
```

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "json",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "convert_json_to_text",
    "input": {
      "json": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Get All List Items

Get all items from a specific list

#### Input Parameters
- **search**: `Text`
  Pattern to search

- **offset**: `Number`

- **limit**: `Number`
  Max number of results to return

- **sort**: `Text`
  Target for sorting

- **direction**: `Text`
  Sorting: asc or desc

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "kizeo-forms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_all_list_items",
    "input": {
      "search": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "offset": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sort": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "direction": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},

      "actionName": "action_name",
```

## Triggers

### Event On Data Received

Handle EventOnData receive event via webhooks

#### Input Parameters
- **format**: `StaticDropdown`
  Select the output format

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "format": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

### Event On Data

Handle EventOnData events via webhooks

#### Input Parameters
- **format**: `StaticDropdown`
  Select the output format

- **event1**: `StaticDropdown`
  Which events will trigger this hook

- **event2**: `StaticDropdown`
  Which events will trigger this hook

- **event3**: `StaticDropdown`
  Which events will trigger this hook

- **event4**: `StaticDropdown`
  Which events will trigger this hook

- **event5**: `StaticDropdown`
  Which events will trigger this hook

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "format": null,
      "event1": null,
      "event2": null,
      "event3": null,
      "event4": null,
      "event5": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

# KrispCall

KrispCall is a cloud telephony system for modern businesses, offering advanced features for high-growth startups and modern enterprises.

## Actions

### Delete Contacts

Delete contacts from krispcall.

#### Input Parameters
- **contacts**: `Array`
  Enter contact which you want to delete.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "krispcall",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "deleteContacts",
    "input": {
      "contacts": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Send MMS

Send mms in krispcall.

#### Input Parameters
- **from_number**: `Dropdown`
  Select an number

- **to_number**: `Number`
  Enter the number to which you want to send sms.

- **content**: `Text`
  Enter your message here.

- **medias**: `Array`
  Enter medias urls

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "krispcall",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "sendMms",
    "input": {
      "from_number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "to_number": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "medias": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addContact",

      "company": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
```

# LeadConnector

Lead Connector - Go High Level

## Actions

### Create Contact

Create a new contact.

#### Input Parameters
- **firstName**: `Text`

- **lastName**: `Text`

- **email**: `Text`

- **phone**: `Text`

- **companyName**: `Text`

- **website**: `Text`

- **tags**: `MultiSelectDropdown`

- **source**: `Text`

- **country**: `Dropdown`
  When using a dynamic value, make sure to use the ISO-2 country code, and not the country name.

- **city**: `Text`

- **state**: `Text`

- **address**: `Text`

- **postalCode**: `Text`

- **timezone**: `Dropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "leadconnector",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_contact",
    "input": {
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "companyName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "website": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "source": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "country": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "city": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "state": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "address": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "postalCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timezone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

  The ID of the contact.

- **firstName**: `Text`

- **lastName**: `Text`

- **email**: `Text`

- **phone**: `Text`

- **companyName**: `Text`

- **website**: `Text`

- **tags**: `MultiSelectDropdown`

- **source**: `Text`

- **country**: `Dropdown`
  When using a dynamic value, make sure to use the ISO-2 country code, and not the country name.

- **city**: `Text`

- **state**: `Text`

- **address**: `Text`

- **postalCode**: `Text`

- **timezone**: `Dropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "leadconnector",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_contact",
    "input": {
      "id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "companyName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "website": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "source": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "country": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "city": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "state": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "address": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "postalCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timezone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"

    }

}
```

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "leadconnector",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_opportunity",
    "input": {
      "pipeline": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "stage": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contact": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "assignedTo": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "monetaryValue": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New Opportunity

Trigger when a new opportunity is added.

#### Input Parameters
- **pipeline**: `Dropdown`
  The ID of the pipeline to use.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "pipeline": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

```json
    "pieceName": "lever",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "updateOpportunityStage",
    "input": {
      "opportunityId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "stage": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"

    }
```

---


### Add feedback to opportunity

Provide feedback to a candidate after an interview

#### Input Parameters
- **performAs**: `Dropdown`

- **opportunityId**: `Text`

- **panelId**: `Dropdown`
  If you select one, you must select an interview too

- **interviewId**: `Dropdown`
  Mandatory is you select an interview panel

- **feedbackTemplateId**: `Dropdown`
  Ignored if you select an interview panel and an interview

- **feedbackFields**: `DynamicProperties`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "lever",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addFeedbackToOpportunity",
    "input": {
      "performAs": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "opportunityId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "panelId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "interviewId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "feedbackTemplateId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "feedbackFields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
```

```json
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
```

# Linear

Issue tracking for modern software teams

## Actions

### Raw GraphQL query

Perform a raw GraphQL query

#### Input Parameters
- **query**: `Text`

- **variables**: `Object`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "linear",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "rawGraphqlQuery",
    "input": {
      "query": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "variables": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```
