# OpenRouter

Use any AI model to generate code, text, or images via OpenRouter.ai.

## Actions

### Ask LLM

The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion, don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. The exact limit varies by model. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion. Some models are suitable for natural language tasks, others specialize in code.

- **prompt**: `Text`
  The prompt to send to the model.

- **temperature**: `Number`
  Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

- **maxTokens**: `Number`
  The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion, don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. The exact limit varies by model. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

- **topP**: `Number`
  An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openrouter",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "ask-lmm",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "temperature": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "maxTokens": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "topP": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# OpenAI

Use the many tools ChatGPT has to offer.

## Actions

### Transcribe Audio

Transcribe audio to text using whisper-1 model

#### Input Parameters
- **audio**: `File`
  Audio file to transcribe

- **language**: `StaticDropdown`
  Language of the audio file the default is en (English).

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "transcribe",
    "input": {
      "audio": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "language": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Extract Structured Data from Text

Returns structured data from provided unstructured text.

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `Dropdown`

- **text**: `Text`

- **params**: `Array`

- **propName**: `Text`
  Provide the name of the value you want to extract from the unstructured text. The name should be unique and short.

- **propDescription**: `Text`
  Brief description of the data, this hints for the AI on what to look for

- **propDataType**: `StaticDropdown`
  Type of parameter.

- **propIsRequired**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "extract-structured-data",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "params": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "propName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "propDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "propDataType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "propIsRequired": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Translate Audio

Translate audio to text using whisper-1 model

#### Input Parameters
- **audio**: `File`
  Audio file to translate

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "translate",
    "input": {
      "audio": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Vision Prompt

The image URL or file you want GPT's vision to read.

#### Input Parameters
- **image**: `File`
  The image URL or file you want GPT's vision to read.

- **prompt**: `Text`
  What do you want ChatGPT to tell you about the image?

- **detail**: `Dropdown`
  Control how the model processes the image and generates textual understanding.

- **temperature**: `Number`
  Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

- **maxTokens**: `Number`
  The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion, don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. The exact limit varies by model. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

- **topP**: `Number`
  An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

- **frequencyPenalty**: `Number`
  Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

- **presencePenalty**: `Number`
  Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the mode's likelihood to talk about new topics.

- **roles**: `JSON`
  Array of roles to specify more accurate response

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "vision_prompt",
    "input": {
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "detail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "temperature": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "maxTokens": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "topP": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "frequencyPenalty": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "presencePenalty": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "roles": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Ask ChatGPT

The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion depending on the model. Don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion. Some models are suitable for natural language tasks, others specialize in code.

- **prompt**: `Text`

- **temperature**: `Number`
  Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

- **maxTokens**: `Number`
  The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion depending on the model. Don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text

- **topP**: `Number`
  An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

- **frequencyPenalty**: `Number`
  Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

- **presencePenalty**: `Number`
  Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the mode's likelihood to talk about new topics.

- **memoryKey**: `Text`
  A memory key that will keep the chat history shared across runs and flows. Keep it empty to leave ChatGPT without memory of previous messages.

- **roles**: `JSON`
  Array of roles to specify more accurate response

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "ask_chatgpt",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "temperature": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "maxTokens": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "topP": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "frequencyPenalty": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "presencePenalty": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "memoryKey": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "roles": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Text-to-Speech

Generate an audio recording from text

#### Input Parameters
- **text**: `Text`
  The text you want to hear.

- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the audio.

- **speed**: `Number`
  The speed of the audio. Minimum is 0.25 and maximum is 4.00.

- **voice**: `Dropdown`
  The voice to generate the audio in.

- **format**: `Dropdown`
  The format you want the audio file in.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "text_to_speech",
    "input": {
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "speed": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "voice": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "format": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Generate Image

Generate an image using text-to-image models

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the image.

- **prompt**: `Text`

- **resolution**: `Dropdown`
  The resolution to generate the image in.

- **quality**: `Dropdown`
  Standard is faster, HD has better details.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "openai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "generate_image",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resolution": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quality": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Triggers

### Paste Changed

Triggers when the content (or title) of the paste changes

#### Input Parameters
- **paste_id**: `Text`

- **include_title**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "paste_id": null,
      "include_title": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

# Perplexity AI

AI powered search engine

## Actions

### Ask AI

Please refer [guide](https://docs.perplexity.ai/guides/model-cards) for each model token limit.

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `StaticDropdown`

- **prompt**: `Text`

- **temperature**: `Number`
  The amount of randomness in the response.Higher values are more random, and lower values are more deterministic.

- **max_tokens**: `Number`
  Please refer [guide](https://docs.perplexity.ai/guides/model-cards) for each model token limit.

- **top_p**: `Number`
  The nucleus sampling threshold, valued between 0 and 1 inclusive. For each subsequent token, the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass.

- **presence_penalty**: `Number`
  Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the mode's likelihood to talk about new topics.

- **frequency_penalty**: `Number`
  A multiplicative penalty greater than 0. Values greater than 1.0 penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

- **roles**: `JSON`
  Array of roles to specify more accurate response.After the (optional) system message, user and assistant roles should alternate with user then assistant, ending in user.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "perplexity-ai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "ask-ai",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "temperature": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "max_tokens": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "top_p": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "presence_penalty": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "frequency_penalty": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "roles": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

---


### Create Product

Creates a new product.

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`

- **code**: `Text`

- **description**: `Text`

- **unit**: `Text`

- **tax**: `Number`

- **isActive**: `Boolean`

- **currency**: `Text`
  Please enter currency code.

- **price**: `Number`

- **cost**: `Number`

- **overheadCost**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "pipedrive",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-product",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tax": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "isActive": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currency": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cost": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "overheadCost": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Triggers

### Updated Organization

Triggers when an existing organization is updated.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

# Postgres

The world's most advanced open-source relational database

## Actions

### Run Query

Run Query

#### Input Parameters
- **markdown**: `MarkDown`

- **query**: `Text`
  Please use $1, $2, etc. for parameterized queries to avoid SQL injection.

- **args**: `Array`
  Arguments to be used in the query

- **query_timeout**: `Number`
  An integer indicating the maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a query to complete before timing out.

- **connection_timeout_ms**: `Number`
  An integer indicating the maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established before timing out.

- **application_name**: `Text`
  A string indicating the name of the client application connecting to the server.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "postgres",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "run-query",
    "input": {
      "markdown": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "query": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "args": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "query_timeout": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "connection_timeout_ms": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "application_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New Row

triggered when a new row is added

#### Input Parameters
- **description**: `MarkDown`

- **table**: `Dropdown`

- **order_by**: `Dropdown`
  Use something like a created timestamp or an auto-incrementing ID.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "description": null,
      "table": null,
      "order_by": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# PostHog

Open-source product analytics

## Actions

### Create Project

Create a posthog project

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`
  Project Name

- **slack_incoming_webhook**: `Text`
  Slack incoming webhook

- **anonymize_ips**: `Boolean`
  Whether to anonymize incoming IP addresses.

- **is_demo**: `Boolean`
  If this is a demo project

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "posthog",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_project",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "slack_incoming_webhook": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "anonymize_ips": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "is_demo": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Event

User's Distinct Id

#### Input Parameters
- **event**: `Text`
  The event name

- **event_type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **distinct_id**: `Text`
  User's Distinct Id

- **properties**: `Object`
  The event properties

- **context**: `Object`
  The event context,

- **message_id**: `Text`
  The message id,

- **category**: `Text`
  The event category.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "posthog",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_event",
    "input": {
      "event": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "event_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "distinct_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "properties": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "context": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "message_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "category": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# Pushover

Simple push notification service

## Actions

### Send Notification

Send a notification to Pushover

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`
  The title of the notification

- **message**: `Text`
  The message to send

- **html**: `Boolean`
  To enable HTML parsing

- **priority**: `Number`
  The priority of the notification (-2 to 2). -2 is lowest priority. If set to 2, you should also specify Retry and Expire.

- **retry**: `Number`
  Works only if priority is set to 2. Specifies how often (in seconds) the Pushover servers will send the same notification to the user.

- **expire**: `Number`
  Works only if priority is set to 2. Specifies how many seconds your notification will continue to be retried for (every retry seconds).

- **url**: `Text`
  A supplementary URL to show with your message.

- **url_title**: `Text`
  A title for the URL specified as the url input parameter, otherwise just the URL is shown.

- **timestamp**: `Text`
  a Unix timestamp of a time to display instead of when our API received it.

- **device**: `Text`
  The name of one of your devices to send just to that device instead of all devices.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "pushover",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_notification",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "message": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "html": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "priority": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "retry": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "expire": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "url_title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timestamp": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "device": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Qdrant

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "qdrant",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "add_points_to_collection",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "qdrant",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "collection_list",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
```

# Queue

A piece that allows you to push items into a queue, providing a way to throttle requests or process data in a First-In-First-Out (FIFO) manner.

## Actions

### Clear queue

Clears all items inside a queue

#### Input Parameters
- **info**: `MarkDown`

- **queueName**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "queue",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "clear-queue",
    "input": {
      "info": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "queueName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Push to Queue

Push item to queue

#### Input Parameters
- **info**: `MarkDown`

- **queueName**: `Text`

- **items**: `Array`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "queue",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "push-to-queue",
    "input": {
      "info": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "queueName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "items": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Pull items from queue

Pull items from queue

#### Input Parameters
- **info**: `MarkDown`

- **queueName**: `Text`

- **numOfItems**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "queue",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "pull-from-queue",
    "input": {
      "info": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "queueName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "numOfItems": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Quickzu

Streamline ordering from whatsapp

## Actions

```json
    "input": {
      "term": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",

    }
```

---


### Add Product

Adds new product to store.

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`

- **desc**: `Text`

- **mrp**: `Number`

- **price**: `Number`
  Selling price should be equal or less than MRP.

- **unit**: `StaticDropdown`

- **value_per_unit**: `Number`

- **availability**: `Boolean`

- **exclude_tax**: `Boolean`

- **enable_variants**: `Boolean`

- **status**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "quickzu",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "quickzu_add_product",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "desc": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mrp": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "value_per_unit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "availability": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "exclude_tax": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "enable_variants": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Update Business Time

Updates business hours.

#### Input Parameters
- **items**: `Array`

- **weekday**: `StaticDropdown`

- **start**: `Text`
  Please use 24:00 hour format

- **end**: `Text`
  Please use 24:00 hour format

- **status**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "quickzu",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "quickzu_update_business_time",
    "input": {
      "items": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "weekday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "start": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "end": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Product Discount

Creates a new discount for category or product level.

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`

- **start_date**: `DateTime`
  Please use YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **end_date**: `DateTime`
  Please use YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **filter_type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Choose what gets discount (products/categories).

- **selectedFilterValues**: `DynamicProperties`
  Categories eligible for a discount.

- **type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **value**: `Text`

- **is_enabled**: `Boolean`

- **is_visible**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "quickzu",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "quickzu_create_product_discount",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "start_date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "end_date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "filter_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "selectedFilterValues": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "is_enabled": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "is_visible": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Promo/Coupon Code

Creates a new promo code for category or product level.

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`

- **start_date**: `DateTime`
  Please use YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **end_date**: `DateTime`
  Please use YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **filter_type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Choose what gets discount (products/categories).

- **selectedFilterValues**: `DynamicProperties`
  Categories eligible for a discount.

- **promo_code**: `Text`

- **minimum_cart_value**: `Number`

- **max_users_limit**: `Number`

- **type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **value**: `Text`

- **is_enabled**: `Boolean`

- **is_visible**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "quickzu",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "quickzu_create_promo_code",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "start_date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "end_date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "filter_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "selectedFilterValues": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "promo_code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "minimum_cart_value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "max_users_limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "is_enabled": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "is_visible": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Triggers

### Order Created/Updated

Triggers when a new order is created or a order status is changed in store.

#### Input Parameters
- **md**: `MarkDown`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "md": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# RabbitMQ
## Actions

### sendMessageToExchange

Send a message on a RabbitMQ exchange

#### Input Parameters
- **exchange**: `Text`
  The name of the exchange to send the message to

- **routingKey**: `Text`
  The routing key to use when sending the message

- **data**: `JSON`
  The data to send

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "rabbitmq",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "sendMessageToExchange",
    "input": {
      "exchange": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "routingKey": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "data": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### sendMessageToQueue

Send a message on a RabbitMQ queue

#### Input Parameters
- **queue**: `Text`
  The name of the exchange to send the message to

- **data**: `JSON`
  The data to send

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "rabbitmq",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "sendMessageToQueue",
    "input": {
      "queue": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "data": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### Message Received

Triggers when a message is received on a RabbitMQ queue

#### Input Parameters
- **queue**: `Text`
  The name of the queue to listen to

- **maxMessagesPerPoll**: `Number`
  The maximum number of messages to fetch per poll

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "queue": null,
      "maxMessagesPerPoll": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Razorpay
## Actions

### Create Payment Link

Create a payment link

#### Input Parameters
- **amount**: `Number`

- **currency**: `Text`

- **reference_id**: `Text`

- **description**: `Text`

- **customer_name**: `Text`

- **customer_contact**: `Text`

- **notify_sms**: `Boolean`
  Send notification via SMS

- **customer_email**: `Text`

- **notify_email**: `Boolean`
  Send notification via Email

- **metafield_notes**: `Text`

- **callback_url**: `Text`

- **callback_method**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "razorpay",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-payment-link",
    "input": {
      "amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currency": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "reference_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customer_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customer_contact": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "notify_sms": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customer_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "notify_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "metafield_notes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "callback_url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "callback_method": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Get Campaign Analytics

Fetch analytics data for a selected campaign based on a date range.

#### Input Parameters
- **campaignId**: `Dropdown`
  Choose a campaign from the list or enter the campaign ID manually.

- **startDate**: `Text`
  Enter the start date (YYYY-MM-DD). E.g. 2023-10-11

- **endDate**: `Text`
  Enter the end date (YYYY-MM-DD). E.g. 2023-10-20

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "reachinbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "getCampaignAnalytics",
    "input": {
      "campaignId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "startDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "endDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }

}
```

### Add Blocklist

Add email addresses, domains, and keywords to the blocklist.

#### Input Parameters
- **emails**: `Array`
  Enter the email addresses to block (e.g., ["abc@gmail.com"]

- **domains**: `Array`
  Enter the domains to block (e.g., ["example.com"]

- **keywords**: `Array`
  Enter keywords to block (e.g., ["spam", "blacklist"]

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "reachinbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addBlocklist",
    "input": {
      "emails": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "domains": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "keywords": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Add Leads

Add leads to campaigns dynamically by selecting a campaign, entering lead details, and including custom variables.

#### Input Parameters
- **campaignId**: `Dropdown`
  Choose a campaign from the list.

- **email**: `Text`
  Enter the email address for the lead

- **firstName**: `Text`
  Enter the first name for the lead

- **lastName**: `Text`
  Enter the last name for the lead

- **customVariables**: `Array`
  Add custom variables as key-value pairs for the lead.

- **key**: `Text`
  Enter the key for the custom variable

- **value**: `Text`
  Enter the value for the custom variable

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "reachinbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addLeads",
    "input": {
      "campaignId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customVariables": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "key": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Set Schedule

Update the schedule for a specific Campaign

#### Input Parameters
- **campaignId**: `Dropdown`
  Choose a campaign from the list or enter the campaign ID manually.

- **scheduleName**: `Text`
  Enter the schedule name here (e.g., New schedule).

- **startDate**: `DateTime`
  Enter the start date (e.g., 2023-08-01T00:00:00.000Z).

- **endDate**: `DateTime`
  Enter the end date (e.g., 2024-08-25T00:00:00.000Z).

- **startTime**: `Text`
  Enter the start time (e.g., 09:00).

- **endTime**: `Text`
  Enter the end time (e.g., 12:00).

- **timezone**: `Text`
  Enter the timezone (e.g., America/Detroit).

- **sunday**: `Boolean`
  Choose "Yes" if you want to set a schedule for Sunday.

- **monday**: `Boolean`
  Choose "Yes" if you want to set a schedule for Monday.

- **tuesday**: `Boolean`
  Choose "Yes" if you want to set a schedule for Tuesday.

- **wednesday**: `Boolean`
  Choose "Yes" if you want to set a schedule for Wednesday.

- **thursday**: `Boolean`
  Choose "Yes" if you want to set a schedule for Thursday.

- **friday**: `Boolean`
  Choose "Yes" if you want to set a schedule for Friday.

- **saturday**: `Boolean`
  Choose "Yes" if you want to set a schedule for Saturday.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "reachinbox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "setSchedule",
    "input": {
      "campaignId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scheduleName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "startDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "endDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "startTime": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "endTime": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timezone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sunday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "monday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tuesday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "wednesday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "thursday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "friday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "saturday": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

- **markdown**: `MarkDown`

```json

  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "markdown": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Reoon Email Verifier

Email validation service that cleans invalid, temporary & unsafe email addresses.

## Actions

### Verify Email

Verify a single email

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`
  Email to verify

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "reoon-email-verifier",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "verifyEmail",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Bulk Email Verification

Creates bulk email verification task.

#### Input Parameters
- **taskName**: `Text`
  Name of the verification task

- **emails**: `Array`
  Emails to verify (You can also provide multiple emails separated by comma

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "reoon-email-verifier",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "bulkEmailVerificationTask",
    "input": {
      "taskName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "emails": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Bulk Verification Result

Retrieves result of bulk verification email by task ID.

#### Input Parameters
- **task_id**: `Text`
  Provide the task ID for the bulk verification task. You can fetch this from the `Create Bulk Email Verification` action.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "reoon-email-verifier",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "bulkVerificationResult",
    "input": {
      "task_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Resend

Email for developers

## Actions

### Send Email

Send a text or HTML email

#### Input Parameters
- **to**: `Array`
  Emails of the recipients

- **from_name**: `Text`
  Sender name

- **from**: `Text`
  Sender email

- **bcc**: `Array`
  List of emails in bcc

- **cc**: `Array`
  List of emails in cc

- **reply_to**: `Text`
  Email to receive replies on (defaults to sender

- **subject**: `Text`

- **content**: `Text`
  HTML is only allowed if you selected HTML as type

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "resend",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_email",
    "input": {
      "to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bcc": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cc": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "reply_to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "subject": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Robolly

Robolly is the all‑in‑one service for personalized image, video & PDF generation with API

## Actions

### Generate Image

Type: ${field.type}

#### Input Parameters
- **template_id**: `Dropdown`
  Select your template. (If you want to use Template ID. Click on the "(x)" above this field. Template ID can be found by opening a template and going to “Render”. Being there copy the template ID from the top right.

- **format**: `StaticDropdown`
  The format of the image to generate.

- **fields**: `DynamicProperties`
  Type: ${field.type}

- **modifications**: `Object`
  The extra modifications to apply to the image. See "Detailed dynamic modifications" in https://robolly.com/docs/api-reference/

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "robolly",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "generate_image",
    "input": {
      "template_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "format": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "modifications": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### New Item In Feed

Runs when a new item is added in the RSS feed

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Saastic

Revenue and churn analytics for Stripe

## Actions

### Create a Customer Charge

The customer's email address.

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`
  The customer's email address.

- **amount**: `Number`
  The amount charged in the smallest currency unit.

- **currency**: `Text`
  The ISO currency code.

- **charged_at**: `DateTime`
  The date the customer was charged.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "saastic",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_charge",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currency": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "charged_at": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create or Update a Customer

The customer's first name.

#### Input Parameters
- **first_name**: `Text`
  The customer's first name.

- **last_name**: `Text`
  The customer's last name.

- **email**: `Text`
  The customer's email address.

- **phone**: `Text`
  The customer's phone number. Ex: +15555555555

- **signed_up_at**: `DateTime`
  The date the customer signed up.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "saastic",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_customer",
    "input": {
      "first_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "last_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "signed_up_at": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Schedule

Trigger flow with fixed schedule

## Triggers

### Every Day

Triggers the current flow every day

#### Input Parameters
- **hour_of_the_day**: `StaticDropdown`

- **run_on_weekends**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "hour_of_the_day": null,
      "run_on_weekends": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

```json
        "pieceName": "piece_name",

          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }

}
```

# Utility AI
## Actions

Classify your text into one of your provided categories.

```json
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "utility-ai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "classifyText",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Classifies if text or image contains hate, hate/threatening, self-harm, sexual, sexual/minors, violence, or violence/graphic content.

```json
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "utility-ai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "checkModeration",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
  "type": "PIECE",

    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},

      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
```

# VBOUT

Marketing automation platform for agencies

## Actions

### Update Contact

Updates a contact in a given email list.

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`
  Contact email for update.

- **ipaddress**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vbout",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "vbout_update_contact",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ipaddress": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Email List

Creates a new email list.

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`
  The name of the list.

- **email_subject**: `Text`
  The default subscription subject.

- **reply_to**: `Text`
  The Reply to email of the list.

- **fromemail**: `Text`
  The From email of the list.

- **from_name**: `Text`
  The From name of the list.

- **notify_email**: `Text`
  Notification Email.

- **success_email**: `Text`
  Subscription Success Email.

- **success_message**: `Text`
  Subscription Success Message.

- **error_message**: `Text`
  Subscription Error Message.

- **confirmation_email**: `Text`
  Confirmation Email Message.

- **confirmation_message**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vbout",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "vbout_create_email_list",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email_subject": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "reply_to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fromemail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "notify_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "success_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "success_message": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "error_message": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "confirmation_email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "confirmation_message": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Village

The Social Capital API

## Actions

### Find Company Paths

If you're a Village Partner, use this field that identifies your user

#### Input Parameters
- **user_identifier**: `Text`
  If you're a Village Partner, use this field that identifies your user

- **company_domain_url**: `Text`
  The Company Domain URL of the company you're trying to find paths to. E.g. https://openai.com/

- **company_linkedin_url**: `Text`
  The Company Linkedin URL of the company you're trying to find paths to. E.g. https://www.linkedin.com/company/openai/

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "village",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "fetchCompaniesPaths",
    "input": {
      "user_identifier": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "company_domain_url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "company_linkedin_url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

If you're a Village Partner, use this field that identifies your user

```json
  "valid": true,

    "pieceName": "village",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

      "user_identifier": "{previousStep.output_field}"

    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
```

### Create New Product

Create a new product in your catalog

#### Input Parameters
- **Name**: `Text`

- **Title**: `Text`

- **Description**: `Text`

- **BrandId**: `Number`

- **CategoryId**: `Number`

- **LinkId**: `Text`

- **RefId**: `Text`

- **Id**: `Number`
  Set the product ID

- **IsVisible**: `Boolean`

- **DescriptionShort**: `Text`

- **ReleaseDate**: `Text`

- **KeyWords**: `Text`
  Similar words

- **IsActive**: `Boolean`

- **TaxCode**: `Text`

- **MetaTagDescription**: `Text`

- **ShowWithoutStock**: `Boolean`

- **Score**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vtex",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-product",
    "input": {
      "Name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "BrandId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "CategoryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "LinkId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "RefId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "IsVisible": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "DescriptionShort": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ReleaseDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "KeyWords": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "IsActive": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "TaxCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "MetaTagDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ShowWithoutStock": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Score": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
```

### Update a Product

#### Input Parameters
- **productId**: `Number`
  Set the product ID

- **Name**: `Text`

- **Title**: `Text`

- **Description**: `Text`

- **BrandId**: `Number`

- **CategoryId**: `Number`

- **DepartmentId**: `Number`

- **LinkId**: `Text`

- **RefId**: `Text`

- **BrandName**: `Text`

- **IsVisible**: `Boolean`

- **DescriptionShort**: `Text`

- **ReleaseDate**: `Text`

- **KeyWords**: `Text`
  Similar words

- **IsActive**: `Boolean`

- **TaxCode**: `Text`

- **MetaTagDescription**: `Text`

- **ShowWithoutStock**: `Boolean`

- **Score**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vtex",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "Update-product",
    "input": {
      "productId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "BrandId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "CategoryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "DepartmentId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "LinkId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "RefId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "BrandName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "IsVisible": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "DescriptionShort": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ReleaseDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "KeyWords": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "IsActive": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "TaxCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "MetaTagDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ShowWithoutStock": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Score": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Create New Sku File

Create a new SKU File to your catalog

#### Input Parameters
- **SkuId**: `Number`
  Set the Sku ID

- **Url**: `Text`

- **Name**: `Text`

- **IsMain**: `Boolean`

- **Label**: `Text`

- **Text**: `Text`
  General text of the image

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vtex",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-sku-file",
    "input": {
      "SkuId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "IsMain": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Label": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
```

### Create New Sku

Create a new SKU to your catalog

#### Input Parameters
- **ProductId**: `Number`
  ID of the product to be associated with this SKU

- **Name**: `Text`
  Name the variation of the product

- **PackagedHeight**: `Number`

- **PackagedLength**: `Number`

- **PackagedWidth**: `Number`

- **PackagedWeightKg**: `Number`

- **IsActive**: `Boolean`

- **IsKit**: `Boolean`

- **Id**: `Number`
  Set the Sku ID

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vtex",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-sku",
    "input": {
      "ProductId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "PackagedHeight": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "PackagedLength": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "PackagedWidth": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "PackagedWeightKg": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "IsActive": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "IsKit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "Id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Vtiger

CRM software for sales, marketing, and support teams

## Actions

### Query Records

Query records by SQL statement.

#### Input Parameters
- **query**: `Text`
  Enter the query statement, e.g. SELECT count(*) FROM Contacts;

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vtiger",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "query_records",
    "input": {
      "query": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Custom API Call

Enter the desired request headers. Skip the authorization headers

#### Input Parameters
- **headers**: `JSON`
  Enter the desired request headers. Skip the authorization headers

- **data**: `JSON`
  Enter the data to pass. if its POST, it will be sent as body data, and if GET, as query string

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vtiger",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "make_api_call",
    "input": {
      "headers": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "data": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

Field ${field.name} of object type ${elementType}

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "vtiger",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_record",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New or Updated Record

Triggers when a new record is introduced or a record is updated.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---
