# Webhook

Receive HTTP requests and trigger flows using unique URLs.

## Actions

### Return Response

return a response

#### Input Parameters
- **responseType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **fields**: `DynamicProperties`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "webhook",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "return_response",
    "input": {
      "responseType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### Catch Webhook

Receive incoming HTTP/webhooks using any HTTP method such as GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.

#### Input Parameters
- **liveMarkdown**: `MarkDown`

- **syncMarkdown**: `MarkDown`

- **testMarkdown**: `MarkDown`

- **authFields**: `DynamicProperties`

- **username**: `Text`
  The username to use for authentication.

- **password**: `Text`
  The password to use for authentication.

- **headerName**: `Text`
  The name of the header to use for authentication.

- **headerValue**: `Text`
  The value to check against the header.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "liveMarkdown": null,
      "syncMarkdown": null,
      "testMarkdown": null,
      "authFields": null,
      "username": null,
      "password": null,
      "headerName": null,
      "headerValue": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Webling
## Actions

### Get Events by ID

Comma seperated list of event IDs (e.g. '536,525,506,535'). When at least one ID doesn't exist the whole query return a 404 error.

#### Input Parameters
- **eventIds**: `Text`
  Comma seperated list of event IDs (e.g. '536,525,506,535'). When at least one ID doesn't exist the whole query return a 404 error.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "webling",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "EventsById",
    "input": {
      "eventIds": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New or Updated Event

Triggers when an event is added or updated.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### On Changed Data

Triggers when anything was added, updated or deleted since last request.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Wedof

Automatisez la gestion de vos dossiers de formations (CPF, EDOF, Kairos, AIF, OPCO et autres

## Actions

### Liste de toutes les activités et tâches d'un dossier

Liste de toutes les activités et tâches d'un dossier (Dossier de formation / Dossier de certification

#### Input Parameters
- **entityClass**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de n'obtenir que les dossiers dans le type considéré - par défaut tous les types sont retournés

- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "listActivitiesAndTasks",
    "input": {
      "entityClass": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Envoyer un fichier

Permet d'envoyer un fichier pour un dossier (Dossier de formation / Dossier de certification

#### Input Parameters
- **entityClass**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de n'obtenir que les dossiers dans le type considéré - par défaut tous les types sont retournés

- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier

- **title**: `Text`

- **typeId**: `DynamicProperties`

- **typeFile**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de choisir la méthode d'envoi du fichier

- **files**: `DynamicProperties`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "sendFile",
    "input": {
      "entityClass": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "typeId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "typeFile": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "files": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Créer une tâche

Permet de créer une tâche d'un dossier (Dossier de formation / Dossier de certification

#### Input Parameters
- **entityClass**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de n'obtenir que les dossiers dans le type considéré - par défaut tous les types sont retournés

- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier

- **title**: `Text`

- **dueDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ.

- **description**: `Text`

- **userEmail**: `Text`

- **link**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createTask",
    "input": {
      "entityClass": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dueDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "userEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "link": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Créer une activité

Permet de créer une activité d'un dossier (Dossier de formation / Dossier de certification

#### Input Parameters
- **entityClass**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de n'obtenir que les dossiers dans le type considéré - par défaut tous les types sont retournés

- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier

- **title**: `Text`

- **description**: `Text`

- **userEmail**: `Text`

- **eventTime**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ.

- **eventEndTime**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ.

- **link**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createActivitie",
    "input": {
      "entityClass": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "userEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "eventTime": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "eventEndTime": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "link": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Passer un dossier de certification à l'état : À contrôler

Change l'état d'un dossier de certification vers : À contrôler

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de certification

- **enrollmentDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationEndDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **examinationPlace**: `Text`

- **comment**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "declareCertificationFolderToControl",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "enrollmentDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationEndDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationPlace": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Détail du résultat de l'examen

Change l'état d'un dossier de certification vers : à repasser

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de certification

- **detailedResult**: `Text`

- **examinationDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationEndDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationPlace**: `Text`

- **comment**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "declareCertificationFolderToRetake",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "detailedResult": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationEndDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationPlace": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de certification

- **enrollmentDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationEndDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **examinationPlace**: `Text`

- **tiersTemps**: `StaticDropdown`
  Indique si le candidat a besoin d'un tiers temps

- **comment**: `Text`

```json

  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "declareCertificationFolderToTake",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "enrollmentDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationEndDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationPlace": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tiersTemps": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment": "{previousStep.output_field}"

    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
```

### (Période) et jusqu'au

Permet de filtrer les dossiers de certification qui sont exclus de l'accrochage

#### Input Parameters
- **query**: `Text`
  Nom, prénom, N° de dossier, N° de certification etc..

- **periodForm**: `DynamicProperties`

- **cdcExcluded**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de filtrer les dossiers de certification qui sont exclus de l'accrochage

- **cdcCompliant**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de filtrer les dossiers de certification selon le fait qu'ils contiennent les données de l'apprenant obligatoires pour l'accrochage en cas d'obtention de la certification

- **cdcToExport**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de filtrer les dossiers de certification qui devront être inclus dans les prochains exports pour l'accrochage (par défaut oui, sauf si déjà accroché avec succès

- **limit**: `Number`
  Nombre de dossiers de certification maximum qui seront retournés par requête

- **page**: `Number`
  Par défaut : 1

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "searchCertificationFolder",
    "input": {
      "query": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "periodForm": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cdcExcluded": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cdcCompliant": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cdcToExport": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Tiers temps

Met à jour certaines informations modifiables d'un dossier de certification

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de certification

- **enrollmentDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD

- **examinationDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD

- **examinationEndDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD

- **examinationPlace**: `Text`
  Lieu de l'examen de certification (ou lien https

- **tiersTemps**: `StaticDropdown`
  Indique si le candidat a besoin d'un tiers temps

- **comment**: `Text`
  Commentaire (non-visible par l'apprenant

- **verbatim**: `Text`
  Verbatim

- **amountHt**: `Number`
  Tarif en €

- **tags**: `Array`
  Liste de tags associée au dossier de certification, si vous souhaitez garder vos précédents tags, il faut les réécrire dans le champ

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "updateCertificationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "enrollmentDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationEndDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "examinationPlace": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tiersTemps": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "verbatim": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "amountHt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Passer un dossier de certification à l’état : Refuser

Change l'état d'un dossier de certification vers : Refuser

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de certification

- **comment**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "refuseCertificationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Récupération d'une enquête

Permet de récupérer une enquête associée à un dossier de certification

#### Input Parameters
- **certificationFolderExternalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de certification

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "getCertificationFolderSurvey",
    "input": {
      "certificationFolderExternalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Nombre d'enquêtes

Récupérer l'ensemble des enquêtes de l'organisme de l'utilisateur connecté

#### Input Parameters
- **certifInfo**: `Text`
  Permet de n'obtenir que les enquêtes liées à la certification considérée

- **limit**: `Text`
  Nombre d'éléments retourné par requête - par défaut 100

- **order**: `StaticDropdown`
  Tri les résultats par ordre ascendant ou descendant

- **page**: `Number`
  Par défaut : 1

- **state**: `StaticDropdown`
  Permet de n'obtenir que les enquêtes en fonction de l'état considéré

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "listCertificationFolderSurveys",
    "input": {
      "certifInfo": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "order": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "state": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### (Période) et jusqu'au

Liste les dossiers de formation en fonction des critères sélectionnés

#### Input Parameters
- **query**: `Text`
  Nom, prénom, N° de dossier, N° de certification etc..

- **periodForm**: `DynamicProperties`

- **proposalCode**: `Text`
  Code de la proposition commercial Wedof associé

- **limit**: `Number`
  Nombre de dossiers de formation maximum qui seront retournés par requête

- **page**: `Number`
  Par défaut : 1

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "listRegistrationFolders",
    "input": {
      "query": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "periodForm": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "proposalCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "page": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Taux d'avancement

Met à jour certaines informations modifiables d'un dossier de formation

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **price**: `Number`
  Nouveau tarif en €

- **sessionStartDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD

- **sessionEndDate**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD

- **notes**: `Text`
  Notes privées (non-visible par l'apprenant

- **completionRate**: `Number`
  Taux d'avancement en % compris entre 0% et 100%. Uniquement sous format d'un entier. Uniquement possible à l'état En formation et Sortie de formation

- **indicativeDuration**: `Number`
  En heures, durée moyenne de la formation

- **weeklyDuration**: `Number`
  En heures, ne peut pas être supérieur à 99

- **tags**: `Array`
  Liste de tags associée au dossier de formation, si vous souhaitez garder vos précédents tags, il faut les réécrire dans le champ

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "updateRegistrationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sessionStartDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sessionEndDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "notes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "completionRate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "indicativeDuration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "weeklyDuration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Passer un dossier de formation à l'état : sortie de formation

Change l'état d'un dossier de formation vers : sortie de formation

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **date**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

- **code**: `Dropdown`
  Sélectionner la raison de sortie de formation

- **absenceDuration**: `Number`
  La durée d'une éventuelle absence en heures. 0 si aucune absence.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "declareRegistrationFolderTerminated",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "absenceDuration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Valider le dossier de formation

Passer l'état du dossier de formation à l'état validé

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **indicativeDuration**: `Number`
  Obligatoire dans le cas d'un dossier de formation avec financement France Travail

- **weeklyDuration**: `Number`
  Intensité hebdomadaire de la formation, en heures par semaine

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "validateRegistrationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "indicativeDuration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "weeklyDuration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
```

Mettre à jour le taux d'avancement en % d'assiduité d'un apprenant pour un Dossier de formation donné.

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **completionRate**: `Number`
  Taux d'avancement en % compris entre 0% et 100%. Uniquement sous format d'un entier. Uniquement possible à l'état En formation et Sortie de formation

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "updateCompletionRate",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "completionRate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Refuser le dossier de formation

Refuser le dossier de formation

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **code**: `Dropdown`
  Sélectionner la raison du refus

- **description**: `Text`
  Texte expliquant les raisons du refus

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "refuseRegistrationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "cancelRegistrationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"

    }

}
```

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "getRegistrationFolderDocuments",
    "input": {
      "Id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Passer un dossier de formation à l'état : Service fait déclaré

Change l'état d'un dossier de formation vers : Service fait déclaré

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **absenceDuration**: `Number`
  La durée d'une éventuelle absence en heures. 0 si aucune absence.

- **trainingDuration**: `Number`
  Précise la durée totale de la formation afin de calculer le % d'absence

- **code**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {code} du bloc Raisons de sortie de formation

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "declareRegistrationFolderServicedone",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "absenceDuration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "trainingDuration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Facturer le dossier de formation

Associe le dossier de formation à un n° de facture et transmets les informations de facturation au financeur (EDOF par exemple

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **billNumber**: `Text`
  N° de la facture à associer

- **vatRate**: `Number`
  Permet de forcer un Taux de TVA en %. Par défaut la TVA est calculée à partir des données du dossier de formation

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "billRegistrationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "billNumber": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "vatRate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Récupérer un dossier de formation

Récupérer un dossier de formation à partir de son n° de dossier

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "getRegistrationFolder",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
```

### Passer un dossier de formation à l'état : En formation

Change l'état d'un dossier de formation vers : En formation

#### Input Parameters
- **externalId**: `Text`
  Sélectionner la propriété {externalId} du dossier de formation

- **date**: `DateTime`
  Date au format YYYY-MM-DD.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wedof",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "declareRegistrationFolderIntraining",
    "input": {
      "externalId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### Nouveau dossier de certification

Se déclenche lorsqu'un nouveau dossier de certification est créé

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### Événement sur le dossier de certification

Se déclenche lorsque l'événement choisi se produit sur un dossier de certification

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### Dossier de certification réussi

Se déclenche lorsqu'un dossier de formation passe à l'état réussi

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### Dossier de certification mis à jour

Se déclenche lorsqu'un dossier de certification est mis à jour

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### Dossier de certification à repasser

Se déclanche lorsqu'un dossier de certification est prét à repasser

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

# Segment
## Actions

### Identify User
#### Input Parameters
- **userId**: `Text`

- **traits**: `Object`
  The traits to associate with the user

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "segment",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "identifyUser",
    "input": {
      "userId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "traits": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# SendFox

Email marketing made simple

## Actions

### Create Contact

Create a new contact

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`

- **firstname**: `Text`

- **lastname**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sendfox",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-contact",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstname": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastname": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"

    "packageType": "REGISTRY",

      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },

    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",

    }
  }
}
```

# SendGrid

Email delivery service for sending transactional and marketing emails

## Actions

### Send Email

Send a text or HTML email

#### Input Parameters
- **to**: `Array`
  Emails of the recipients

- **from**: `Text`
  Sender email, must be on your SendGrid

- **from_name**: `Text`
  Sender name

- **reply_to**: `Text`
  Email to receive replies on (defaults to sender

- **subject**: `Text`

- **content**: `Text`
  HTML is only allowed if you selected HTML as type

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sendgrid",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_email",
    "input": {
      "to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "reply_to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "subject": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Send Dynamic Template

Send an email using a dynamic template

#### Input Parameters
- **to**: `Array`
  Emails of the recipients

- **from_name**: `Text`
  Sender name

- **from**: `Text`
  Sender email, must be on your SendGrid

- **template_id**: `Text`
  Dynamic template id

- **template_data**: `JSON`
  Dynamic template data

- **reply_to**: `Text`
  Email to receive replies on (defaults to sender

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sendgrid",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send_dynamic_template",
    "input": {
      "to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "from": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "template_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "template_data": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "reply_to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# Brevo

Formerly Sendinblue, is a SaaS solution for relationship marketing

## Actions

### Create or Update Contact

Email address of the user. Mandatory if "SMS" field is not passed in "attributes" parameter. Mobile Number in SMS field should be passed with proper country code. For example: {"SMS":"+91xxxxxxxxxx"} or {"SMS":"0091xxxxxxxxxx"}

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`
  Email address of the user. Mandatory if "SMS" field is not passed in "attributes" parameter. Mobile Number in SMS field should be passed with proper country code. For example: {"SMS":"+91xxxxxxxxxx"} or {"SMS":"0091xxxxxxxxxx"}

- **ext_id**: `Text`
  Pass your own Id to create a contact.

- **attributes**: `Object`
  Pass the set of attributes and their values. The attribute's parameter should be passed in capital letter while creating a contact. These attributes must be present in your SendinBlue account. For eg: {"FNAME":"Elly", "LNAME":"Roger"}

- **email_blacklisted**: `Boolean`
  Set this field to blacklist the contact for emails (emailBlacklisted = true

- **sms_blacklisted**: `Boolean`
  Set this field to blacklist the contact for SMS (smsBlacklisted = true

- **list_ids**: `Array`
  Ids of the lists to add the contact to.

- **smtp_blacklist_sender**: `Boolean`
  transactional email forbidden sender for contact. Use only for email Contact ( only available if updateEnabled = true

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "brevo",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_or_update_contact",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ext_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "attributes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email_blacklisted": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sms_blacklisted": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "list_ids": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "smtp_blacklist_sender": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# Sendy

Self-hosted email marketing software

## Actions

### Unsubscribe Multiple Lists

The user's email

#### Input Parameters
- **lists**: `MultiSelectDropdown`
  Select the lists to subscribe to

- **email**: `Text`
  The user's email

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sendy",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "unsubscribe_multiple",
    "input": {
      "lists": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Subscribe Multiple Lists

The user's email

#### Input Parameters
- **lists**: `MultiSelectDropdown`
  Select the lists to subscribe to

- **email**: `Text`
  The user's email

- **name**: `Text`
  The user's name

- **country**: `Text`
  The user's 2 letter country code

- **ipaddress**: `Text`
  The user's IP address

- **referrer**: `Text`
  The URL where the user signed up from

- **gdpr**: `Boolean`
  If you're signing up EU users in a GDPR compliant manner, set to true

- **silent**: `Boolean`
  set to true if your list is 'Double opt-in' but you want to bypass that and signup the user to the list as 'Single Opt-in instead

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sendy",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "subscribe_multiple_lists",
    "input": {
      "lists": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "country": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ipaddress": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "referrer": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gdpr": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "silent": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

---


### Create Campaign

Create a new campaign

#### Input Parameters
- **fromEmail**: `Text`
  The email address the campaign will be sent from

- **fromName**: `Text`
  The name the campaign will be sent from

- **replyTo**: `Text`
  The email address that will be used for replies

- **title**: `Text`
  The title of the campaign

- **subject**: `Text`
  The subject of the campaign email

- **plainText**: `Text`
  The plain text version of the campaign email

- **html**: `Text`
  The HTML version of the campaign email

- **lists**: `MultiSelectDropdown`
  Select lists to send the campaign to

- **excludeLists**: `MultiSelectDropdown`
  Select lists to exclude from the campaign send

- **segments**: `Text`
  Comma separated list of segment IDs to send the campaign to

- **excludeSegments**: `Text`
  Comma separated list of segment IDs to exclude from the campaign send

- **queryString**: `Text`
  The query string to append to the campaign URL

- **trackOpens**: `StaticDropdown`
  Enable open tracking

- **trackClicks**: `StaticDropdown`
  Enable click tracking

- **autoSend**: `Boolean`
  Automatically send the campaign after creation

- **schedule**: `DateTime`
  Schedule the campaign to be sent at a specific date and time. Date/time format: 2023-06-09T12:00:00Z

- **timezone**: `StaticDropdown`
  The timezone to use for the schedule

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sendy",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_campaign",
    "input": {
      "fromEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fromName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "replyTo": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "subject": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "plainText": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "html": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lists": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "excludeLists": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "segments": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "excludeSegments": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "queryString": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "trackOpens": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "trackClicks": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "autoSend": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "schedule": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timezone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Subscribe Updated

The user's email

#### Input Parameters
- **list**: `Dropdown`
  Select the list to subscribe to

- **email**: `Text`
  The user's email

- **name**: `Text`
  The user's name

- **country**: `Text`
  The user's 2 letter country code

- **ipaddress**: `Text`
  The user's IP address

- **referrer**: `Text`
  The URL where the user signed up from

- **gdpr**: `Boolean`
  If you're signing up EU users in a GDPR compliant manner, set to true

- **silent**: `Boolean`
  set to true if your list is 'Double opt-in' but you want to bypass that and signup the user to the list as 'Single Opt-in instead

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sendy",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "subscribe",
    "input": {
      "list": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "country": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ipaddress": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "referrer": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gdpr": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "silent": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Sessions.us

Video conferencing platform for businesses and professionals

## Actions

### Create Event

Quickly create an event.

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`
  The name of the event

- **startAt**: `DateTime`
  Select a date and time

- **plannedEnd**: `DateTime`
  Select a date and time

- **timezone**: `Dropdown`
  The timezone which the session will take place.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sessions.us",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_event",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "startAt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "plannedEnd": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timezone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# FTP/SFTP

Connect to FTP, FTPS or SFTP servers

## Actions

### Create File from Text

Create a new file in the given path

#### Input Parameters
- **fileName**: `Text`

- **fileContent**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_file",
    "input": {
      "fileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fileContent": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Upload File

Upload a file to the given path.

#### Input Parameters
- **fileName**: `Text`
  The path on the sftp server to store the file. e.g. `./myfolder/test.mp3

- **fileContent**: `File`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "upload_file",
    "input": {
      "fileName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fileContent": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Folder

Creates a folder at given path.

#### Input Parameters
- **folderPath**: `Text`
  The new folder path e.g. `./myfolder`. For FTP/FTPS, it will create nested folders if necessary.

- **recursive**: `Boolean`
  For SFTP only: Create parent directories if they do not exist

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createFolder",
    "input": {
      "folderPath": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "recursive": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Read File Content

Read the content of a file.

#### Input Parameters
- **filePath**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "read_file_content",
    "input": {
      "filePath": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Rename File or Folder

Renames a file or folder at given path.

#### Input Parameters
- **information**: `MarkDown`

- **oldPath**: `Text`
  The path of the file or folder to rename e.g. `./myfolder/test.mp3

- **newPath**: `Text`
  The new path of the file or folder e.g. `./myfolder/new-name.mp3

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "renameFileOrFolder",
    "input": {
      "information": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "oldPath": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "newPath": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Delete file

Deletes a file at given path.

#### Input Parameters
- **filePath**: `Text`
  The path of the file to delete e.g. `./myfolder/test.mp3

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "deleteFile",
    "input": {
      "filePath": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### List Folder Contents

Lists the contents of a given folder.

#### Input Parameters
- **directoryPath**: `Text`
  The path of the folder to list e.g. `./myfolder

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "listFolderContents",
    "input": {
      "directoryPath": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Delete Folder

Deletes an existing folder at given path.

#### Input Parameters
- **folderPath**: `Text`
  The path of the folder to delete e.g. `./myfolder

- **recursive**: `Boolean`
  Enable this option to delete the folder and all its contents, including subfolders and files.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "ftp/sftp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "deleteFolder",
    "input": {
      "folderPath": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "recursive": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New File

Trigger when a new file is created or modified.

#### Input Parameters
- **path**: `Text`
  The path to watch for new files

- **ignoreHiddenFiles**: `Boolean`
  Ignore hidden files

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "path": null,
      "ignoreHiddenFiles": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Whatsable

Manage your WhatsApp business account

## Actions

### Send Message
#### Input Parameters
- **to**: `Text`
  The recipient of the message

- **text**: `Text`
  The message to send

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "whatsable",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "sendMessage",
    "input": {
      "to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Product

Create a Product

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`
  Enter the name

- **type**: `StaticDropdown`
  Select the type

- **regular_price**: `Number`
  Enter the regular price

- **description**: `Text`
  Enter the description

- **short_description**: `Text`
  Enter the short description

- **categories**: `Text`
  Enter the category IDs (comma separated

- **images**: `Text`
  Enter the URLs of images you want to upload (comma separated

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "woocommerce",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "Create Product",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "regular_price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "short_description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "categories": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "images": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Customer

Create a Customer

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`
  Enter the email

- **first_name**: `Text`
  Enter the first name

- **last_name**: `Text`
  Enter the last name

- **username**: `Text`
  Enter the username

- **password**: `Text`
  Enter the password

- **street_address**: `Text`
  Enter the street address

- **city**: `Text`
  Enter the city

- **state**: `Text`
  Enter the state

- **postcode**: `Text`
  Enter the postcode

- **country**: `Text`
  Enter the country

- **phone**: `Text`
  Enter the phone

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "woocommerce",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "Create Customer",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "first_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "last_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "username": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "password": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "street_address": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "city": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "state": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "postcode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "country": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
```

## Triggers

### 
```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Wootric

Measure and boost customer happiness

## Actions

### Trigger Wootric Survey

Trigger a survey from Wootric

#### Input Parameters
- **emails**: `Array`
  End user emails, where you want the survey to be received

- **surveyImmediately**: `Boolean`
  Enter "true" to survey immediately to bypass checks, otherwise "false

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wootric",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "trigger_wootric_survey",
    "input": {
      "emails": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "surveyImmediately": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Page

Create new page on WordPress

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`
  Title of the page about to be added

- **content**: `Text`
  Uses the WordPress Text Editor which supports HTML

- **slug**: `Text`

- **date**: `Text`
  Page publish date (ISO-8601

- **status**: `StaticDropdown`
  Choose status

- **excerpt**: `Text`
  Uses the WordPress Text Editor which supports HTML

- **comment_status**: `Boolean`

- **ping_status**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wordpress",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_page",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "excerpt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment_status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ping_status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

    "input": {
      "id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",

        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
```

---


### Create Post

Create new post on WordPress

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`
  Title of the post about to be added

- **content**: `Text`
  Uses the WordPress Text Editor which supports HTML

- **slug**: `Text`

- **date**: `Text`
  Post publish date (ISO-8601

- **acfFields**: `Object`
  Provide field name with value.You can find out field name from ACF plugin menu.

- **excerpt**: `Text`
  Uses the WordPress Text Editor which supports HTML

- **comment_status**: `Boolean`

- **ping_status**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "wordpress",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_post",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "acfFields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "excerpt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comment_status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ping_status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Convert JSON to XML

Field to add your tag's attributes

- **header**: `Boolean`

```json
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "xml",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "convert-json-to-xml",
    "input": {
      "json": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "attributes_key": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "header": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
```

- **cacheResponse**: `Boolean`
  Store the response in the project store for future use.

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "zerobounce",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "validateEmail",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cacheResponse": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
```

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# Zoho Invoice

Online invoicing software for businesses

## Triggers

### New Invoice

Trigger when a new invoice is received.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Zuora

Cloud-based subscription management platform that enables businesses to launch and monetize subscription services.

## Actions

### Find Product

Retrieves product based on sku.

#### Input Parameters
- **sku**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "zuora",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "find-product",
    "input": {
      "sku": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Invoice

Create a standalone invoice.

#### Input Parameters
- **accountNumber**: `Text`
  The number of the customer account associated with the invoice.

- **autoPay**: `Boolean`
  Whether invoices are automatically picked up for processing in the corresponding payment run.

- **comments**: `Text`

- **dueDate**: `DateTime`
  Provide YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **invoiceDate**: `DateTime`
  Provide YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **invoiceItems**: `Array`

- **productRatePlanChargeId**: `Text`
  The ID of the product rate plan charge that the invoice item is created from.You can use `Find Product Rate Plan` action to search associate rate plan charge.

- **amount**: `Number`

- **description**: `Text`

- **purchaseOrderNumber**: `Text`

- **quantity**: `Text`

- **serviceStartDate**: `Text`
  Provide YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **serviceEndDate**: `Text`
  Provide YYYY-MM-DD format.

- **status**: `StaticDropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "zuora",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-invoice",
    "input": {
      "accountNumber": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "autoPay": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "comments": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dueDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "invoiceDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "invoiceItems": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productRatePlanChargeId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "purchaseOrderNumber": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quantity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "serviceStartDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "serviceEndDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "zuora",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "find-product-rate-plan",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productid": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }

}
```

```json
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_order",
    "input": {
      "id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phoneNumber": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",

      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
```

### Upload Product Image

Upload a new product image.

#### Input Parameters
- **id**: `Text`
  The ID of the product.

- **image**: `File`
  The public URL or the base64 image to use

- **position**: `Number`
  1 makes it the main image.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "upload_product_image",
    "input": {
      "id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "position": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```
