### Adjust Inventory Level

Adjust inventory level of an item at a location.

#### Input Parameters
- **id**: `Number`
  The ID of the inventory item.

- **locationId**: `Number`
  The ID of the location.

- **adjustment**: `Number`
  Positive values increase inventory, negative values decrease it.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "adjust_inventory_level",
    "input": {
      "id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "locationId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "adjustment": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Order

Create a new order.

#### Input Parameters
- **productId**: `Number`
  The ID of the product to create the order with.

- **variantId**: `Number`
  The ID of the variant to create the order with.

- **title**: `Text`

- **quantity**: `Number`

- **price**: `Text`

- **customerId**: `Text`
  The ID of the customer to use.

- **email**: `Text`

- **sendReceipt**: `Boolean`

- **sendFulfillmentReceipt**: `Boolean`

- **tags**: `Text`
  A string of comma-separated tags for filtering and search

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_order",
    "input": {
      "productId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "variantId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quantity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customerId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sendReceipt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sendFulfillmentReceipt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Transaction

Create a new transaction.

#### Input Parameters
- **orderId**: `Number`
  The ID of the order to create a transaction for.

- **kind**: `Dropdown`

- **currency**: `Text`

- **amount**: `Text`

- **authorization**: `Text`

- **parentId**: `Number`
  The ID of an associated transaction.

- **source**: `Text`
  An optional origin of the transaction. Set to external to import a cash transaction for the associated order.

- **test**: `Boolean`
  Whether the transaction is a test transaction.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_transaction",
    "input": {
      "orderId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "kind": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currency": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "authorization": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "parentId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "source": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "test": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Product

Create a new product.

#### Input Parameters
- **title**: `Text`

- **bodyHtml**: `Text`
  Product description (supports HTML

- **productType**: `Text`
  A categorization for the product used for filtering and searching products

- **productImage**: `File`
  The public URL or the base64 image to use

- **status**: `StaticDropdown`

- **vendor**: `Text`

- **tags**: `Text`
  A string of comma-separated tags for filtering and search

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_product",
    "input": {
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bodyHtml": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productImage": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "vendor": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
```

### Update Product

Update an existing product.

#### Input Parameters
- **id**: `Text`
  The ID of the product.

- **title**: `Text`

- **bodyHtml**: `Text`
  Product description (supports HTML

- **productType**: `Text`
  A categorization for the product used for filtering and searching products

- **productImage**: `File`
  The public URL or the base64 image to use

- **tags**: `Text`
  A string of comma-separated tags for filtering and search

```json

  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

    "input": {
      "id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bodyHtml": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productImage": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "vendor": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Customer

Create a new customer.

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`

- **verifiedEmail**: `Boolean`
  Whether the customer has verified their email.

- **sendEmailInvite**: `Boolean`

- **firstName**: `Text`

- **lastName**: `Text`

- **phoneNumber**: `Text`

- **tags**: `Text`
  A string of comma-separated tags for filtering and search

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_customer",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "verifiedEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sendEmailInvite": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "phoneNumber": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create Draft Order

Create a new draft order.

#### Input Parameters
- **productId**: `Number`
  The ID of the product to create the order with.

- **variantId**: `Number`
  The ID of the variant to create the order with.

- **title**: `Text`

- **quantity**: `Number`

- **price**: `Text`

- **customerId**: `Text`
  The ID of the customer to use.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "shopify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_draft_order",
    "input": {
      "productId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "variantId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quantity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customerId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
      "sendEmailInvite": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"

      "phoneNumber": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
```

## Triggers

### New Abandoned Checkout

Triggers when a checkout is abandoned.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---




# SimplePDF

PDF editing and generation tool

## Triggers

### New Submission

Triggers when a form receives a new submission

#### Input Parameters
- **md**: `MarkDown`

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "md": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

```json
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",

      }
    }
```

### Find User by Handle

Finds a user by matching against their Slack handle.

#### Input Parameters
- **handle**: `Text`
  User handle (display name), without the leading @

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "slack",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "slack-find-user-by-handle",
    "input": {
      "handle": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Set User Status

Sets a user's custom status

#### Input Parameters
- **text**: `Text`

- **emoji**: `Text`
  Emoji shortname (standard or custom), e.g. :tada: or :train:

- **expiration**: `Number`
  Unix timestamp - if not set, the status will not expire

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "slack",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "slack-set-user-status",
    "input": {
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "emoji": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "expiration": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }

    "valid": true,
```

### Update Profile

Changing a user's email address will send an email to both the old and new addresses, and also post a slackbot message to the user informing them of the change.

#### Input Parameters
- **firstName**: `Text`

- **lastName**: `Text`

- **email**: `Text`
  Changing a user's email address will send an email to both the old and new addresses, and also post a slackbot message to the user informing them of the change.

- **userId**: `Text`
  ID of user to change. This argument may only be specified by admins on paid teams.You can use **Find User by Email** action to retrieve ID.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "slack",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "slack-update-profile",
    "input": {
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "userId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Create Channel

Creates a new channel.

#### Input Parameters
- **channelName**: `Text`

- **isPrivate**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "slack",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "slack-create-channel",
    "input": {
      "channelName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "isPrivate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Markdown to Slack format

Convert Markdown-formatted text to Slack's pseudo - markdown syntax

#### Input Parameters
- **markdown**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "slack",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "markdownToSlackFormat",
    "input": {
      "markdown": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### Channel created

Triggers when a channel is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "APP_WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Reaction

Triggers when a new reaction is added to a message

#### Input Parameters
- **emojis**: `Array`
  Select emojis to trigger on

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "APP_WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "emojis": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Message

Triggers when a new message is received

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "APP_WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Mention

Triggers when a username is mentioned.

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "APP_WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Smaily

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "smaily",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get-subscriber",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Create or Update Subscriber

Go to **Subscribers Tab-> All Subscribers -> Manage Fields** to get custom field names.

#### Input Parameters
- **email**: `Text`

- **is_unsubscribed**: `StaticDropdown`

- **custom_fields**: `Object`
  Go to **Subscribers Tab-> All Subscribers -> Manage Fields** to get custom field names.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "smaily",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create-or-update-subscriber",
    "input": {
      "email": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "is_unsubscribed": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "custom_fields": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# SMTP

Send emails using Simple Mail Transfer Protocol

## Actions

### Sender Name

Send an email using a custom SMTP server.

#### Input Parameters
- **from**: `Text`

- **senderName**: `Text`

- **to**: `Array`

- **cc**: `Array`

- **replyTo**: `Text`

- **bcc**: `Array`

- **subject**: `Text`

- **body_type**: `StaticDropdown`

- **body**: `Text`

- **customHeaders**: `Object`

- **attachments**: `Array`

- **file**: `File`
  File to attach to the email you want to send

- **name**: `Text`
  In case you want to change the name of the attachment

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "smtp",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "send-email",
    "input": {
      "from": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "senderName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "to": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cc": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "replyTo": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bcc": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "subject": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "body_type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "body": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customHeaders": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "attachments": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "file": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Snowflake

Data warehouse built for the cloud

```json
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "snowflake",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "insert-row",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Run Query

Run Query

#### Input Parameters
- **sqlText**: `Text`
  Use :1, :2… or ? placeholders to use binding parameters.

- **binds**: `Array`
  Binding parameters for the SQL query (to prevent SQL injection attacks

- **timeout**: `Number`
  An integer indicating the maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a query to complete before timing out.

- **application**: `Text`
  A string indicating the name of the client application connecting to the server.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "snowflake",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "runQuery",
    "input": {
      "sqlText": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "binds": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timeout": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "application": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---




# SOAP

Simple Object Access Protocol for communication between applications

## Actions

### Call SOAP Method

Call a SOAP from a given wsdl specification

#### Input Parameters
- **wsdl**: `Text`

- **method**: `Dropdown`
  The SOAP Method

- **args**: `DynamicProperties`
  Arguments for the SOAP method

- **parsed**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "soap",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "call_method",
    "input": {
      "wsdl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "method": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "args": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "parsed": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Sperse

Sperse CRM enables secure payment processing and affiliate marketing for online businesses

## Actions

### Add or Update Contact

The contact's full name.

#### Input Parameters
- **importType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **matchExisting**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will try to find an existing record using Email and Full Name and update it.

- **contactId**: `Number`
  Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

- **fullName**: `Text`
  The contact's full name.

- **namePrefix**: `Text`
  The title used to address the contact.

- **firstName**: `Text`
  Required if Last Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **middleName**: `Text`
  The contact's middle name.

- **lastName**: `Text`
  Required if First Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **nickName**: `Text`
  The contact's nick name.

- **nameSuffix**: `Text`
  Additional information about the contact e.g PhD.

- **gender**: `StaticDropdown`

- **dob**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY.

- **bankCode**: `Text`
  The contact's 4-letter personality code.

- **ssn**: `Text`
  The contact's social security number.

- **companyName**: `Text`
  Name of the contact's company (This field is mandatory if the First Name and Last Name fields are empty).

- **jobTitle**: `Text`
  The contact's job title.

- **industry**: `Text`
  The company's industry.

- **workEmail1**: `Text`
  The contact's work email.

- **email1**: `Text`
  The contact's personal email.

- **email2**: `Text`
  The contact's additional email.

- **workPhone1**: `Text`
  The contact's work/primary phone number.

- **homePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's home phone number.

- **mobilePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's mobile phone number.

- **webSiteUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's company website URL.

- **linkedInUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's LinkedIn profile id.

- **photoUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's person photo URL.

- **street**: `Text`
  The contact's full street address (can include apartment or unit number).

- **addressLine2**: `Text`

- **city**: `Text`
  The contact's city of residence.

- **stateName**: `Text`
  The contact's state of residence.

- **stateId**: `Text`
  The contact's state code.

- **zip**: `Text`
  The contact's zip/postal code.

- **countryName**: `Text`
  The contact's country of residence.

- **countryId**: `Text`
  The contact's country code.

- **experience**: `Text`
  The contact's professional experience.

- **profileSummary**: `Text`
  The contact's profile summary.

- **notes**: `Text`
  Additional notes about the contact

- **followUpDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If date is defined then new Follow Up Task will be created for this contact

- **assignedUser**: `Text`
  Preferably, Sperse User Email should be passed as it is unique within Sperse account but User Name can be also passed

- **leadDealAmount**: `Number`
  Estimated deal/opportunity amount.

- **leadSource**: `Text`
  The first known source the contact used to find your website. You can set this automatically and update manually later.

- **channelId**: `Text`
  The channel/medium the contact used to find your website.

- **affiliateCode**: `Text`
  The affiliate/referer partner through which the contact signed up.

- **refererURL**: `Text`
  The webpage where the contact clicked a link that sent them to your website.

- **entryUrl**: `Text`
  The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sperse",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addOrUpdateContact",
    "input": {
      "importType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "matchExisting": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fullName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "namePrefix": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "middleName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "nickName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "nameSuffix": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gender": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dob": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bankCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ssn": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "companyName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "jobTitle": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "industry": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workEmail1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workPhone1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "homePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mobilePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "webSiteUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "linkedInUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "photoUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "street": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "addressLine2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "city": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "stateName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "stateId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "zip": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "countryName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "countryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "experience": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "profileSummary": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "notes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "followUpDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "assignedUser": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "leadDealAmount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "leadSource": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "channelId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "affiliateCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "refererURL": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "entryUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Invoice

Creates a new invoice in the CRM.

#### Input Parameters
- **contactId**: `Number`
  Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

- **contactXref**: `Text`
  External Contact Reference (ID) . Will be used for looking a client

- **status**: `StaticDropdown`

- **invoiceNo**: `Number`

- **date**: `DateTime`
  should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

- **dueDate**: `DateTime`
  should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

- **currencyId**: `StaticDropdown`

- **grandTotal**: `Number`

- **discountTotal**: `Number`

- **shippingTotal**: `Number`

- **taxTotal**: `Number`

- **bCompany**: `Text`

- **bFirstName**: `Text`

- **bLastName**: `Text`

- **bPhone**: `Text`

- **bEmail**: `Text`

- **bCountryId**: `Text`

- **bStateId**: `Text`

- **bStateName**: `Text`

- **bCity**: `Text`

- **bZip**: `Text`

- **bAddress1**: `Text`

- **bAddress2**: `Text`

- **sCompany**: `Text`

- **sFirstName**: `Text`

- **sLastName**: `Text`

- **sPhone**: `Text`

- **sEmail**: `Text`

- **sCountryId**: `Text`

- **sStateId**: `Text`

- **sStateName**: `Text`

- **sCity**: `Text`

- **sZip**: `Text`

- **sAddress1**: `Text`

- **sAddress2**: `Text`

- **note**: `Text`

- **invoiceDescription**: `Text`

- **quantity**: `Number`

- **rate**: `Number`

- **itemTotal**: `Number`

- **commissionableAmount**: `Number`

- **unitId**: `StaticDropdown`

- **productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code. We will look up the product

- **itemDescription**: `Text`

- **sortOrder**: `Number`

- **transactionDate**: `DateTime`
  should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

- **transactionDescription**: `Text`

- **amount**: `Number`

- **gatewayName**: `Text`

- **gatewayTransactionId**: `Text`

- **historicalData**: `StaticDropdown`
  Pass true if this is not actual transaction. Should be False by default

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sperse",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createInvoice",
    "input": {
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactXref": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "invoiceNo": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dueDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currencyId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "grandTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "discountTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "shippingTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "taxTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bCompany": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bFirstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bLastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bPhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bCountryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bStateId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bStateName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bCity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bZip": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bAddress1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bAddress2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sCompany": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sFirstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sLastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sPhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sCountryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sStateId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sStateName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sCity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sZip": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sAddress1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sAddress2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "invoiceDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quantity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "rate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "itemTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "commissionableAmount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unitId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "itemDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sortOrder": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "transactionDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "transactionDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gatewayName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gatewayTransactionId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "historicalData": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Product

Creates a new product in the CRM

#### Input Parameters
- **productType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **name**: `Text`

- **code**: `Text`
  Sku is the product code

- **description**: `Text`

- **descriptionHTML**: `Text`
  Javascript and media tags are not allowed

- **logoURL**: `Text`

- **groupName**: `Text`

- **price**: `Number`
  Required for General , Digital and Event Product Type

- **currencyId**: `StaticDropdown`

- **unit**: `StaticDropdown`
  Required for General and Digital Product Type

- **frequency**: `StaticDropdown`
  Required for General and Digital Product Type

- **fee**: `Number`

- **cycles**: `Number`
  Required for all except LifeTime or OneTime plan

- **signupFee**: `Number`
  Required for all except LifeTime or OneTime plan

- **customPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  Required for Custom or OneTime Plan

- **customPeriodCount**: `Number`
  Required for Custom or OneTime Plan

- **trialDayCount**: `Number`
  Required for OneTime plan

- **gracePeriodDayCount**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sperse",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createProduct",
    "input": {
      "productType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "descriptionHTML": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "logoURL": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "groupName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currencyId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "frequency": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fee": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cycles": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "signupFee": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customPeriodType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customPeriodCount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "trialDayCount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gracePeriodDayCount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Add or Update Contact (Extended

The contact's middle name.

#### Input Parameters
- **matchExisting**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will try to find an existing record using Email and Full Name and update it.

- **overrideLists**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will override lists of contact details in update mode instead of merging them - lists, tags, emails, phones, links, addresses, photos.

- **ignoreInvalidValues**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will save the record even if there are some validation errors.

- **contactId**: `Number`
  Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

- **contactXref**: `Text`
  This is string external reference that can be passed during creation and then if sent again it will update the record.

- **importType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **createUser**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes" then User will be created. Personal email will be used as User Name.

- **sendWelcomeEmail**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes" then Welcome Email will be sent to the newly created user.

- **userPassword**: `Text`
  If password is not passed then it will be automatically generated.

- **namePrefix**: `Text`
  The title used to address the contact.

- **firstName**: `Text`
  Required if Last Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **middleName**: `Text`
  The contact's middle name.

- **lastName**: `Text`
  Required if First Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **nickName**: `Text`
  The contact's nick name.

- **nameSuffix**: `Text`
  Additional information about the contact e.g PhD.

- **gender**: `StaticDropdown`

- **dob**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY.

- **bankCode**: `Text`
  The contact's 4-letter personality code.

- **ssn**: `Text`
  The contact's social security number.

- **drivingLicense**: `Text`

- **drivingLicenseState**: `Text`

- **isActiveMilitaryDuty**: `StaticDropdown`
  Possible values are: Yes, No. If nothing is chosen that means "Unknown".

- **isUSCitizen**: `StaticDropdown`
  Possible values are: Yes, No. If nothing is chosen that means "Unknown".

- **preferredToD**: `StaticDropdown`
  Preferred Time of Day to contact with Client

- **personAffiliateCode**: `Text`
  Affiliate Code is used for the current person detection as a source of new leads. Alphanumeric characters, underscore and hyphen are allowed.

- **email1**: `Text`
  The contact's personal email.

- **email2**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative personal email.

- **email3**: `Text`
  The contact's additional email.

- **workEmail1**: `Text`
  The contact's work email.

- **workEmail2**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative work email.

- **workEmail3**: `Text`
  The contact's other work email.

- **mobilePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's primary phone number.

- **mobilePhoneExt**: `Text`
  The contact's primary phone number extension.

- **homePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's home phone number.

- **homePhoneExt**: `Text`
  The contact's home phone number extension.

- **workPhone1**: `Text`
  The contact's work phone number.

- **workPhone1Ext**: `Text`
  The contact's work phone number extension.

- **workPhone2**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative work phone number.

- **workPhone2Ext**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative work phone number extension.

- **home_street**: `Text`
  The contact's full street address (can include apartment or unit number).

- **home_addressLine2**: `Text`

- **home_city**: `Text`
  The contact's city of residence.

- **home_stateName**: `Text`
  The contact's state of residence.

- **home_stateId**: `Text`
  The contact's state code.

- **home_zip**: `Text`
  The contact's zip/postal code.

- **home_countryName**: `Text`
  The contact's country of residence.

- **home_countryId**: `Text`
  The contact's country code.

- **work_street**: `Text`
  The contact's work address.

- **work_addressLine2**: `Text`

- **work_city**: `Text`
  The contact's work city.

- **work_stateName**: `Text`
  The contact's work state.

- **work_stateId**: `Text`
  The contact's work state code.

- **work_zip**: `Text`
  The contact's work zip code.

- **work_countryName**: `Text`
  The contact's work country.

- **work_countryId**: `Text`
  The contact's work country code.

- **webSiteUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's company website URL.

- **linkedInUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's LinkedIn profile id.

- **photoUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's person photo URL.

- **facebookUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Facebook profile id.

- **instagramUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Instagram profile id.

- **twitterUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Twitter profile id.

- **googlePlusUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Google reviews.

- **angelListUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's AngelList profile id.

- **zoomUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Zoom id.

- **experience**: `Text`
  The contact's professional experience.

- **profileSummary**: `Text`
  The contact's profile summary.

- **notes**: `Text`
  Additional notes about the contact

- **followUpDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If date is defined then new Follow Up Task will be created for this contact

- **assignedUser**: `Text`
  Preferably, Sperse User Email should be passed as it is unique within Sperse account but User Name can be also passed

- **leadDealAmount**: `Number`
  Estimated deal/opportunity amount.

- **customField1**: `Text`
  Additional custom data for the contact record.

- **customField2**: `Text`

- **customField3**: `Text`

- **customField4**: `Text`

- **customField5**: `Text`

- **companyName**: `Text`
  Name of the contact's company (This field is mandatory if the First Name and Last Name fields are empty).

- **organizationType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **isEmployed**: `StaticDropdown`
  Pass yes if the client is employed in this Organization.

- **jobTitle**: `Text`
  The contact's job title.

- **employmentStartDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY

- **employeeCount**: `Text`

- **dateFounded**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY

- **ein**: `Text`

- **annualRevenue**: `Number`

- **industry**: `Text`
  The company's industry.

- **companyPhone**: `Text`

- **companyPhoneExt**: `Text`

- **companyFaxNumber**: `Text`

- **companyEmail**: `Text`

- **companyWebSiteUrl**: `Text`

- **companyFacebookUrl**: `Text`

- **companyLinkedInUrl**: `Text`

- **companyInstagramUrl**: `Text`

- **companyTwitterUrl**: `Text`

- **companyGooglePlusUrl**: `Text`

- **companyCrunchbaseUrl**: `Text`

- **companyBBBUrl**: `Text`

- **companyZoomUrl**: `Text`

- **companyCalendlyUrl**: `Text`

- **companyLogoUrl**: `Text`

- **companyAffiliateCode**: `Text`

- **company_street**: `Text`

- **company_addressLine2**: `Text`

- **company_city**: `Text`

- **company_stateName**: `Text`

- **company_stateId**: `Text`

- **company_zip**: `Text`

- **company_countryName**: `Text`

- **company_countryId**: `Text`

- **leadSource**: `Text`
  The first known source the contact used to find your website. You can set this automatically and update manually later.

- **channelId**: `Text`
  The channel/medium the contact used to find your website.

- **affiliateCode**: `Text`
  The affiliate/referer partner through which the contact signed up.

- **campaignId**: `Text`

- **gclId**: `Text`

- **refererURL**: `Text`
  The webpage where the contact clicked a link that sent them to your website.

- **applicantId**: `Text`

- **applicationId**: `Text`

- **ipAddress**: `Text`

- **userAgent**: `Text`

- **siteId**: `Text`

- **siteUrl**: `Text`

- **dateCreated**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

- **entryUrl**: `Text`
  The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

- **leadStageName**: `Text`
  The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

- **star**: `Text`
  String Value. Supports the following items: Yellow, Blue, Green, Purple, Red. Other values will be skipped.

- **rating**: `Text`
  This is the static array from 1 to 10

- **utmSource**: `Text`

- **utmMedium**: `Text`

- **utmCampaign**: `Text`

- **utmTerm**: `Text`

- **utmContent**: `Text`

- **utmKeyword**: `Text`

- **utmAdGroup**: `Text`

- **utmName**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField1**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField2**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField3**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField4**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField5**: `Text`

- **sub1_productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

- **sub1_paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **sub1_systemType**: `Text`
  Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

- **sub1_code**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

- **sub1_name**: `Text`

- **sub1_level**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

- **sub1_startDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub1_endDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub1_amount**: `Number`

- **sub2_productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

- **sub2_paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **sub2_systemType**: `Text`
  Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

- **sub2_code**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

- **sub2_name**: `Text`

- **sub2_level**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

- **sub2_startDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub2_endDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub2_amount**: `Number`

- **sub3_productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

- **sub3_paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **sub3_systemType**: `Text`
  Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

- **sub3_code**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

- **sub3_name**: `Text`

- **sub3_level**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

- **sub3_startDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub3_endDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub3_amount**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sperse",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addOrUpdateContactExtended",
    "input": {
      "matchExisting": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "overrideLists": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ignoreInvalidValues": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactXref": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "importType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "createUser": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sendWelcomeEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "userPassword": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "namePrefix": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "middleName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "nickName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "nameSuffix": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gender": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dob": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bankCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"

      "drivingLicense": "{previousStep.output_field}"

      "email2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email3": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workEmail1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workEmail2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workEmail3": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mobilePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"

      "homePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "homePhoneExt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
```

---


### Add or Update Subscription

Creates a new subscription.

#### Input Parameters
- **contactId**: `Number`

- **productId**: `Number`

- **contactXref**: `Text`
  ContactXref have to be specified and correct to look up the correct contact

- **productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code (Unique product identifier). ProductCode have to be specified and correct to look up the correct product

- **paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **hasRecurringBilling**: `StaticDropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sperse",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addOrUpdateSubscription",
    "input": {
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactXref": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "paymentPeriodType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "hasRecurringBilling": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New Subscription

Triggers when a new subscription is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Payment

Triggers when a new payment is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Spotify

Music for everyone

## Actions

### Reorder playlist

Reorders items in the playlist

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "spotify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "reorder_playlist",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Search

Searches for tracks, artists, albums, etc.

#### Input Parameters
- **search_text**: `Text`
  The word or phrase you are searching for

- **types**: `StaticMultiSelectDropdown`

- **limit**: `Number`

- **offset**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "spotify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "search",
    "input": {
      "search_text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "types": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "offset": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Get Playlists

Retrieves the list of playlists that you created or followed

#### Input Parameters
- **offset**: `Number`

- **limit**: `Number`

- **all**: `Boolean`
  Fetches all playlists in a single request

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "spotify",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_playlists",
    "input": {
      "offset": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "limit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "all": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Stability AI

Generative AI video model based on the image model Stable Diffusion.

## Actions

### Text to Image

Generate an image using a text prompt

#### Input Parameters
- **prompt**: `Text`
  The text to transform in image.

- **cfg_scale**: `Number`
  How strictly the diffusion process adheres to the prompt text (higher values keep your image closer to your prompt) (MIN:0; MAX:35

- **height**: `Number`
  Height of the image in pixels. Must be in increments of 64 and >= 128

- **width**: `Number`
  Width of the image in pixels. Must be in increments of 64 and >= 128

- **samples**: `Text`
  Number of images to generate (MAX:10

- **steps**: `Number`
  Number of diffusion steps to run (MIN:10; MAX:150

- **weight**: `Number`

- **clip_guidance_preset**: `StaticDropdown`

- **style_preset**: `StaticDropdown`
  Pass in a style preset to guide the image model towards a particular style.

- **engine_id**: `StaticDropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "stability-ai",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "text-to-image",
    "input": {
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cfg_scale": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "height": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "width": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "samples": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "steps": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "weight": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "clip_guidance_preset": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "style_preset": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "engine_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Text to Image
#### Input Parameters
- **prompt**: `Text`

- **model**: `Dropdown`

- **advancedParameters**: `Object`
  Refer to API documentation

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "stable-dffusion-web-ui",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "textToImage",
    "input": {
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "advancedParameters": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Storage

Store or retrieve data from key/value database

## Actions

### Add To List

Add Item to a list

#### Input Parameters
- **key**: `Text`

- **value**: `Text`

- **ignore_if_exists**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "storage",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "add_to_list",
    "input": {
      "key": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ignore_if_exists": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
  }
```


---


### Get

Get a value from storage

#### Input Parameters
- **key**: `Text`

- **defaultValue**: `Text`

- **store_scope**: `StaticDropdown`
  The storage scope of the value.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "storage",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get",
    "input": {
      "key": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "defaultValue": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "store_scope": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Append

Append to a value in storage

#### Input Parameters
- **key**: `Text`

- **value**: `Text`

- **separator**: `Text`
  Separator between added values, use \ for newlines

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "storage",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "append",
    "input": {
      "key": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "separator": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Straico

All-in-one generative AI platform

## Actions

### Ask AI

Enables users to generate prompt completion based on a specified model.

#### Input Parameters
- **model**: `Dropdown`
  The model which will generate the completion. Some models are suitable for natural language tasks, others specialize in code.

- **prompt**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "straico",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "prompt_completion",
    "input": {
      "model": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "prompt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Image Generation

Enables users to generate high-quality images based on textual descriptions.

#### Input Parameters
- **variations**: `StaticDropdown`
  Number of images to generate.

- **size**: `StaticDropdown`
  The desired image dimensions.

- **description**: `Text`
  A detailed textual description of the image to be generated.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "straico",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "image_generation",
    "input": {
      "variations": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "size": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Sub Flows

Trigger and call another sub flow.

## Actions

### Call Flow

Call another sub flow

#### Input Parameters
- **mode**: `StaticDropdown`
  Choose Simple for key-value or Advanced for JSON.

- **flowProps**: `DynamicProperties`

- **waitForResponse**: `Boolean`

- **testingProps**: `DynamicProperties`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sub-flows",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "callFlow",
    "input": {
      "mode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "flowProps": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "waitForResponse": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "testingProps": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Return Response

Return response to the original flow

#### Input Parameters
- **mode**: `StaticDropdown`
  Choose Simple for key-value or Advanced for JSON.

- **response**: `DynamicProperties`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "sub-flows",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "returnResponse",
    "input": {
      "mode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "response": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### Callable Flow

Waiting to be triggered from another flow

#### Input Parameters
- **mode**: `StaticDropdown`
  Choose Simple for key-value or Advanced for JSON.

- **exampleData**: `DynamicProperties`
  The schema to be passed to the flow

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "mode": null,
      "exampleData": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Supadata

YouTube Transcripts

## Actions

### Get Transcript

Fetches transcript of a YouTube video.

#### Input Parameters
- **url**: `Text`
  The URL of a single YouTube video.

- **lang**: `Text`
  Preferred language of the transcript. If not available, the first available language will be returned.

- **text**: `Boolean`
  If true, the transcript will be merged into a single text instead of timestamped chunks.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "supadata",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_transcript",
    "input": {
      "url": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lang": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

```json
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "talkable",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_referral_status",
    "input": {
      "origin_slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },

    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
```

# Text Helper

Tools for text processing

## Actions

### Replace

Replaces all instances of any word, character or phrase in text, with another.

#### Input Parameters
- **text**: `Text`

- **searchValue**: `Text`
  Can be plain text or a regex expression.

- **replaceValue**: `Text`
  Leave empty to delete found results.

- **replaceOnlyFirst**: `Boolean`
  Only replaces the first instance of the search value.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "text-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "replace",
    "input": {
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "searchValue": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "replaceValue": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "replaceOnlyFirst": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Find

Find substring (Regex or Text).

#### Input Parameters
- **text**: `Text`

- **expression**: `Text`
  Regex or text to search for.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "text-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "find",
    "input": {
      "text": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "expression": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Use Default Value if Input is Empty

Checks your input and returns the default value, if the input is an empty text or list

#### Input Parameters
- **value**: `Text`
  Enter value

- **defaultString**: `Text`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "text-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "defaultValue",
    "input": {
      "value": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "defaultString": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

```json
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },

  "nextAction": {
```

```json
    "pieceName": "text-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",

      "html": "{previousStep.output_field}"

    "packageType": "REGISTRY",

      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",

      }
    }
```

### HTML to Markdown

Convert HTML to Markdown

#### Input Parameters
- **html**: `Text`
  The HTML to convert to markdown

- **flavor**: `StaticDropdown`
  The flavor of markdown use during conversion

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "text-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "html_to_markdown",
    "input": {
      "html": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "flavor": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Markdown to HTML

Convert markdown to HTML

#### Input Parameters
- **markdown**: `Text`
  The markdown to convert to HTML

- **flavor**: `StaticDropdown`
  The flavor of markdown use during conversion

- **headerLevelStart**: `Number`
  The minimum header level to use during conversion

- **tables**: `Boolean`
  Whether to support tables during conversion

- **noHeaderId**: `Boolean`
  Whether to add an ID to headers during conversion

- **simpleLineBreaks**: `Boolean`
  Parses line breaks as &lt;br&gt;, without needing 2 spaces at the end of the line

- **openLinksInNewWindow**: `Boolean`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "text-helper",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "markdown_to_html",
    "input": {
      "markdown": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "flavor": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "headerLevelStart": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tables": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "noHeaderId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "simpleLineBreaks": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "openLinksInNewWindow": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

# TidyCal

Streamline your scheduling

## Triggers

### New Booking

Triggers when a new booking is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

Triggers when a new contact is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

```json

  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
```

# Todoist

To-do list and task manager

## Actions

### Find Task

Finds a task by name.

#### Input Parameters
- **name**: `Text`
  The name of the task to search for.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "todoist",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "find_task",
    "input": {
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Marks a task as being completed.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "todoist",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "mark_task_completed",
    "input": {
      "task_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
```
