---


### Create Task

The task's content. It may contain some markdown-formatted text and hyperlinks

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "todoist",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "create_task",
    "input": {
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Update Task

The task's content. It may contain some markdown-formatted text and hyperlinks

#### Input Parameters
- **task_id**: `Text`

- **content**: `Text`
  The task's content. It may contain some markdown-formatted text and hyperlinks

- **description**: `Text`
  A description for the task. This value may contain some markdown-formatted text and hyperlinks.

- **labels**: `Array`
  The task's labels (a list of names that may represent either personal or shared labels

- **priority**: `Number`
  Task priority from 1 (normal) to 4 (urgent

- **due_date**: `Text`
  Can be either a specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format relative to user's timezone, a specific date and time in RFC3339 format, or a human defined date (e.g. 'next Monday') using local time

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "todoist",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "update_task",
    "input": {
      "task_id": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "labels": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "priority": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "due_date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Task Completed

Triggers when a new task is completed

```json

  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
```

# Total CMS

Content management system for modern websites

## Actions

### Save Toggle

Save toggle content to Total CMS

#### Input Parameters
- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the content to save

- **status**: `Boolean`
  The status of the toggle. "true" is on, "false" is off.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "save_toggle",
    "input": {
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Save Image

Save image to Total CMS

#### Input Parameters
- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the content to save

- **image**: `File`
  The image to save

- **alt**: `Text`
  The alt text for the image

- **ext**: `StaticDropdown`
  The extension of the image

- **quality**: `Number`
  The quality of the thumbnail

- **scaleTh**: `Number`
  The scale of the thumbnail

- **scaleSq**: `Number`
  The scale of the square thumbnail

- **resize**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when resizing the thumbnail

- **lcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **pcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **altMeta**: `Boolean`
  Pull the alt text from the meta data of the image. If set, place placeholder text in the alt text field above.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "save_image",
    "input": {
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "alt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ext": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quality": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleTh": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleSq": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resize": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "pcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "altMeta": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Save Date Content

Save date content to Total CMS

#### Input Parameters
- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the content to save

- **timestamp**: `Number`
  The unix timestamp to save

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "save_date",

      "pieceName": "piece_name",

      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
```

```json
  "valid": true,
```

- **quality**: `Number`
  The quality of the thumbnail

- **scaleTh**: `Number`
  The scale of the thumbnail

- **scaleSq**: `Number`
  The scale of the square thumbnail

- **resize**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when resizing the thumbnail

- **lcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **pcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **altMeta**: `Boolean`
  Pull the alt text from the meta data of the image. If set, place placeholder text in the alt text field above.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "save_gallery",
    "input": {
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "alt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quality": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleTh": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleSq": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resize": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "pcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "altMeta": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Save Blog Post

Save blog content to Total CMS

#### Input Parameters
- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the content to save

- **permalink**: `Text`
  The permalink of the blog post. Ensure this is unique or it will overwrite the existing post.

- **title**: `Text`
  The title of the blog post

- **timestamp**: `Number`
  The date in unix timestamp format

- **summary**: `Text`
  The summary of the blog post

- **content**: `Text`
  The content of the blog post

- **extra**: `Text`
  The extra content of the blog post

- **extra2**: `Text`
  The extra content 2 of the blog post

- **media**: `Text`
  The media of the blog post

- **rssTitle**: `Text`
  The RSS title of the blog post

- **rssDescription**: `Text`
  The RSS description of the blog post

- **author**: `Text`
  The author of the blog post

- **genre**: `Text`
  The genre of the blog post

- **categories**: `Text`
  A comma separated list of categories for the blog post

- **tags**: `Text`
  A comma separated list of tags for the blog post

- **labels**: `Text`
  A comma separated list of labels for the blog post

- **draft**: `Boolean`
  Set to true to save as a draft

- **featured**: `Boolean`
  Set to true to save as a featured post

- **archived**: `Boolean`
  Set to true to save as an archived post

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "save_blog_post",
    "input": {
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "permalink": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "title": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "timestamp": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "summary": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "content": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "extra": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "extra2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "media": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "rssTitle": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "rssDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "author": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "genre": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "categories": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "tags": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "labels": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "draft": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "featured": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "archived": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Get Content

Get content from your Total CMS website

  The type of data to return

- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the content to retrieve

```json

  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "get_content",
    "input": {
      "type": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
```

### Save Blog Post Gallery Image

Save image to Total CMS blog post gallery

#### Input Parameters
- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the blog to save

- **permalink**: `Text`
  The permalink of the blog post to save

- **image**: `File`
  The image to save

- **alt**: `Text`
  The alt text for the image

- **quality**: `Number`
  The quality of the thumbnail

- **scaleTh**: `Number`
  The scale of the thumbnail

- **scaleSq**: `Number`
  The scale of the square thumbnail

- **resize**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when resizing the thumbnail

- **lcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **pcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **altMeta**: `Boolean`
  Pull the alt text from the meta data of the image. If set, place placeholder text in the alt text field above.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "save_blog_gallery",
    "input": {
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "permalink": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "alt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quality": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleTh": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleSq": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resize": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "pcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "altMeta": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Save Blog Post Image

Save image to Total CMS blog post

#### Input Parameters
- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the content to save

- **permalink**: `Text`
  The permalink of the blog post to save

- **image**: `File`
  The image to save

- **alt**: `Text`
  The alt text for the image

- **quality**: `Number`
  The quality of the thumbnail

- **scaleTh**: `Number`
  The scale of the thumbnail

- **scaleSq**: `Number`
  The scale of the square thumbnail

- **resize**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when resizing the thumbnail

- **lcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **pcrop**: `StaticDropdown`
  The method to use when cropping the landscape thumbnail for the square thumbnail

- **altMeta**: `Boolean`
  Pull the alt text from the meta data of the image. If set, place placeholder text in the alt text field above.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "total-cms",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "save_blog_image",
    "input": {
      "slug": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "permalink": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "image": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "alt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quality": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleTh": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "scaleSq": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "resize": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "pcrop": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "altMeta": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Triggers

### New Blog Post

Triggers when a new blog post is published

#### Input Parameters
- **slug**: `Text`
  The CMS ID of the content to retrieve

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "POLLING",
    "settings": {
      "slug": null,
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---

```json
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
```

- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

# Twin Web Agent
## Actions

### Browse

Browse the internet with an AI web navigation agent that can find information for you

#### Input Parameters
- **startUrl**: `Text`
  The URL where the browsing task should begin

- **goal**: `Text`
  The goal or objective of the browsing task

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "twin-web-agent",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "startBrowsingTask",
    "input": {
      "startUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "goal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Upgrade.chat

Supercharge your Discord or Telegram communities with subscription payments and membership tools.

## Actions

### Add or Update Contact

The contact's full name.

#### Input Parameters
- **importType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **matchExisting**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will try to find an existing record using Email and Full Name and update it.

- **contactId**: `Number`
  Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

- **fullName**: `Text`
  The contact's full name.

- **namePrefix**: `Text`
  The title used to address the contact.

- **firstName**: `Text`
  Required if Last Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **middleName**: `Text`
  The contact's middle name.

- **lastName**: `Text`
  Required if First Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **nickName**: `Text`
  The contact's nick name.

- **nameSuffix**: `Text`
  Additional information about the contact e.g PhD.

- **gender**: `StaticDropdown`

- **dob**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY.

- **bankCode**: `Text`
  The contact's 4-letter personality code.

- **ssn**: `Text`
  The contact's social security number.

- **companyName**: `Text`
  Name of the contact's company (This field is mandatory if the First Name and Last Name fields are empty).

- **jobTitle**: `Text`
  The contact's job title.

- **industry**: `Text`
  The company's industry.

- **workEmail1**: `Text`
  The contact's work email.

- **email1**: `Text`
  The contact's personal email.

- **email2**: `Text`
  The contact's additional email.

- **workPhone1**: `Text`
  The contact's work/primary phone number.

- **homePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's home phone number.

- **mobilePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's mobile phone number.

- **webSiteUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's company website URL.

- **linkedInUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's LinkedIn profile id.

- **photoUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's person photo URL.

- **street**: `Text`
  The contact's full street address (can include apartment or unit number).

- **addressLine2**: `Text`

- **city**: `Text`
  The contact's city of residence.

- **stateName**: `Text`
  The contact's state of residence.

- **stateId**: `Text`
  The contact's state code.

- **zip**: `Text`
  The contact's zip/postal code.

- **countryName**: `Text`
  The contact's country of residence.

- **countryId**: `Text`
  The contact's country code.

- **experience**: `Text`
  The contact's professional experience.

- **profileSummary**: `Text`
  The contact's profile summary.

- **notes**: `Text`
  Additional notes about the contact

- **followUpDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If date is defined then new Follow Up Task will be created for this contact

- **assignedUser**: `Text`
  Preferably, Sperse User Email should be passed as it is unique within Sperse account but User Name can be also passed

- **leadDealAmount**: `Number`
  Estimated deal/opportunity amount.

- **leadSource**: `Text`
  The first known source the contact used to find your website. You can set this automatically and update manually later.

- **channelId**: `Text`
  The channel/medium the contact used to find your website.

- **affiliateCode**: `Text`
  The affiliate/referer partner through which the contact signed up.

- **refererURL**: `Text`
  The webpage where the contact clicked a link that sent them to your website.

- **entryUrl**: `Text`
  The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "upgrade.chat",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addOrUpdateContact",
    "input": {
      "importType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "matchExisting": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fullName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "namePrefix": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "firstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "middleName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "lastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "nickName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "nameSuffix": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gender": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dob": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bankCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ssn": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "companyName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "jobTitle": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "industry": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workEmail1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "email2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workPhone1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "homePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mobilePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "webSiteUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "linkedInUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "photoUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "street": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "addressLine2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "city": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "stateName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "stateId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "zip": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "countryName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "countryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "experience": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "profileSummary": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "notes": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "followUpDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "assignedUser": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "leadDealAmount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "leadSource": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "channelId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "affiliateCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "refererURL": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "entryUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Invoice

Creates a new invoice in the CRM.

#### Input Parameters
- **contactId**: `Number`
  Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

- **contactXref**: `Text`
  External Contact Reference (ID) . Will be used for looking a client

- **status**: `StaticDropdown`

- **invoiceNo**: `Number`

- **date**: `DateTime`
  should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

- **dueDate**: `DateTime`
  should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

- **currencyId**: `StaticDropdown`

- **grandTotal**: `Number`

- **discountTotal**: `Number`

- **shippingTotal**: `Number`

- **taxTotal**: `Number`

- **bCompany**: `Text`

- **bFirstName**: `Text`

- **bLastName**: `Text`

- **bPhone**: `Text`

- **bEmail**: `Text`

- **bCountryId**: `Text`

- **bStateId**: `Text`

- **bStateName**: `Text`

- **bCity**: `Text`

- **bZip**: `Text`

- **bAddress1**: `Text`

- **bAddress2**: `Text`

- **sCompany**: `Text`

- **sFirstName**: `Text`

- **sLastName**: `Text`

- **sPhone**: `Text`

- **sEmail**: `Text`

- **sCountryId**: `Text`

- **sStateId**: `Text`

- **sStateName**: `Text`

- **sCity**: `Text`

- **sZip**: `Text`

- **sAddress1**: `Text`

- **sAddress2**: `Text`

- **note**: `Text`

- **invoiceDescription**: `Text`

- **quantity**: `Number`

- **rate**: `Number`

- **itemTotal**: `Number`

- **commissionableAmount**: `Number`

- **unitId**: `StaticDropdown`

- **productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code. We will look up the product

- **itemDescription**: `Text`

- **sortOrder**: `Number`

- **transactionDate**: `DateTime`
  should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

- **transactionDescription**: `Text`

- **amount**: `Number`

- **gatewayName**: `Text`

- **gatewayTransactionId**: `Text`

- **historicalData**: `StaticDropdown`
  Pass true if this is not actual transaction. Should be False by default

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "upgrade.chat",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createInvoice",
    "input": {
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactXref": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "status": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "invoiceNo": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "date": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dueDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currencyId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "grandTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "discountTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "shippingTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "taxTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bCompany": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bFirstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bLastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bPhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bCountryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bStateId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bStateName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bCity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bZip": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bAddress1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "bAddress2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sCompany": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sFirstName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sLastName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sPhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sCountryId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sStateId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sStateName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sCity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sZip": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sAddress1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sAddress2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "note": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "invoiceDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "quantity": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "rate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "itemTotal": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "commissionableAmount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unitId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "itemDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sortOrder": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "transactionDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "transactionDescription": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gatewayName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gatewayTransactionId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "historicalData": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {

    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Create Product

Creates a new product in the CRM

#### Input Parameters
- **productType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **name**: `Text`

- **code**: `Text`
  Sku is the product code

- **description**: `Text`

- **descriptionHTML**: `Text`
  Javascript and media tags are not allowed

- **logoURL**: `Text`

- **groupName**: `Text`

- **price**: `Number`
  Required for General , Digital and Event Product Type

- **currencyId**: `StaticDropdown`

- **unit**: `StaticDropdown`
  Required for General and Digital Product Type

- **frequency**: `StaticDropdown`
  Required for General and Digital Product Type

- **fee**: `Number`

- **cycles**: `Number`
  Required for all except LifeTime or OneTime plan

- **signupFee**: `Number`
  Required for all except LifeTime or OneTime plan

- **customPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  Required for Custom or OneTime Plan

- **customPeriodCount**: `Number`
  Required for Custom or OneTime Plan

- **trialDayCount**: `Number`
  Required for OneTime plan

- **gracePeriodDayCount**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "upgrade.chat",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "createProduct",
    "input": {
      "productType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "description": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "descriptionHTML": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "logoURL": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "groupName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "price": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "currencyId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "unit": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "frequency": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "fee": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "cycles": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "signupFee": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customPeriodType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "customPeriodCount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "trialDayCount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "gracePeriodDayCount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Add or Update Contact (Extended

The contact's middle name.

#### Input Parameters
- **matchExisting**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will try to find an existing record using Email and Full Name and update it.

- **overrideLists**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will override lists of contact details in update mode instead of merging them - lists, tags, emails, phones, links, addresses, photos.

- **ignoreInvalidValues**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes", will save the record even if there are some validation errors.

- **contactId**: `Number`
  Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

- **contactXref**: `Text`
  This is string external reference that can be passed during creation and then if sent again it will update the record.

- **importType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **createUser**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes" then User will be created. Personal email will be used as User Name.

- **sendWelcomeEmail**: `StaticDropdown`
  If "Yes" then Welcome Email will be sent to the newly created user.

- **userPassword**: `Text`
  If password is not passed then it will be automatically generated.

- **namePrefix**: `Text`
  The title used to address the contact.

- **firstName**: `Text`
  Required if Last Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **middleName**: `Text`
  The contact's middle name.

- **lastName**: `Text`
  Required if First Name and Company Name fields are empty.

- **nickName**: `Text`
  The contact's nick name.

- **nameSuffix**: `Text`
  Additional information about the contact e.g PhD.

- **gender**: `StaticDropdown`

- **dob**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY.

- **bankCode**: `Text`
  The contact's 4-letter personality code.

- **ssn**: `Text`
  The contact's social security number.

- **drivingLicense**: `Text`

- **drivingLicenseState**: `Text`

- **isActiveMilitaryDuty**: `StaticDropdown`
  Possible values are: Yes, No. If nothing is chosen that means "Unknown".

- **isUSCitizen**: `StaticDropdown`
  Possible values are: Yes, No. If nothing is chosen that means "Unknown".

- **preferredToD**: `StaticDropdown`
  Preferred Time of Day to contact with Client

- **personAffiliateCode**: `Text`
  Affiliate Code is used for the current person detection as a source of new leads. Alphanumeric characters, underscore and hyphen are allowed.

- **email1**: `Text`
  The contact's personal email.

- **email2**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative personal email.

- **email3**: `Text`
  The contact's additional email.

- **workEmail1**: `Text`
  The contact's work email.

- **workEmail2**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative work email.

- **workEmail3**: `Text`
  The contact's other work email.

- **mobilePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's primary phone number.

- **mobilePhoneExt**: `Text`
  The contact's primary phone number extension.

- **homePhone**: `Text`
  The contact's home phone number.

- **homePhoneExt**: `Text`
  The contact's home phone number extension.

- **workPhone1**: `Text`
  The contact's work phone number.

- **workPhone1Ext**: `Text`
  The contact's work phone number extension.

- **workPhone2**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative work phone number.

- **workPhone2Ext**: `Text`
  The contact's alternative work phone number extension.

- **home_street**: `Text`
  The contact's full street address (can include apartment or unit number).

- **home_addressLine2**: `Text`

- **home_city**: `Text`
  The contact's city of residence.

- **home_stateName**: `Text`
  The contact's state of residence.

- **home_stateId**: `Text`
  The contact's state code.

- **home_zip**: `Text`
  The contact's zip/postal code.

- **home_countryName**: `Text`
  The contact's country of residence.

- **home_countryId**: `Text`
  The contact's country code.

- **work_street**: `Text`
  The contact's work address.

- **work_addressLine2**: `Text`

- **work_city**: `Text`
  The contact's work city.

- **work_stateName**: `Text`
  The contact's work state.

- **work_stateId**: `Text`
  The contact's work state code.

- **work_zip**: `Text`
  The contact's work zip code.

- **work_countryName**: `Text`
  The contact's work country.

- **work_countryId**: `Text`
  The contact's work country code.

- **webSiteUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's company website URL.

- **linkedInUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's LinkedIn profile id.

- **photoUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's person photo URL.

- **facebookUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Facebook profile id.

- **instagramUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Instagram profile id.

- **twitterUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Twitter profile id.

- **googlePlusUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Google reviews.

- **angelListUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's AngelList profile id.

- **zoomUrl**: `Text`
  The contact's Zoom id.

- **experience**: `Text`
  The contact's professional experience.

- **profileSummary**: `Text`
  The contact's profile summary.

- **notes**: `Text`
  Additional notes about the contact

- **followUpDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If date is defined then new Follow Up Task will be created for this contact

- **assignedUser**: `Text`
  Preferably, Sperse User Email should be passed as it is unique within Sperse account but User Name can be also passed

- **leadDealAmount**: `Number`
  Estimated deal/opportunity amount.

- **customField1**: `Text`
  Additional custom data for the contact record.

- **customField2**: `Text`

- **customField3**: `Text`

- **customField4**: `Text`

- **customField5**: `Text`

- **companyName**: `Text`
  Name of the contact's company (This field is mandatory if the First Name and Last Name fields are empty).

- **organizationType**: `StaticDropdown`

- **isEmployed**: `StaticDropdown`
  Pass yes if the client is employed in this Organization.

- **jobTitle**: `Text`
  The contact's job title.

- **employmentStartDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY

- **employeeCount**: `Text`

- **dateFounded**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY

- **ein**: `Text`

- **annualRevenue**: `Number`

- **industry**: `Text`
  The company's industry.

- **companyPhone**: `Text`

- **companyPhoneExt**: `Text`

- **companyFaxNumber**: `Text`

- **companyEmail**: `Text`

- **companyWebSiteUrl**: `Text`

- **companyFacebookUrl**: `Text`

- **companyLinkedInUrl**: `Text`

- **companyInstagramUrl**: `Text`

- **companyTwitterUrl**: `Text`

- **companyGooglePlusUrl**: `Text`

- **companyCrunchbaseUrl**: `Text`

- **companyBBBUrl**: `Text`

- **companyZoomUrl**: `Text`

- **companyCalendlyUrl**: `Text`

- **companyLogoUrl**: `Text`

- **companyAffiliateCode**: `Text`

- **company_street**: `Text`

- **company_addressLine2**: `Text`

- **company_city**: `Text`

- **company_stateName**: `Text`

- **company_stateId**: `Text`

- **company_zip**: `Text`

- **company_countryName**: `Text`

- **company_countryId**: `Text`

- **leadSource**: `Text`
  The first known source the contact used to find your website. You can set this automatically and update manually later.

- **channelId**: `Text`
  The channel/medium the contact used to find your website.

- **affiliateCode**: `Text`
  The affiliate/referer partner through which the contact signed up.

- **campaignId**: `Text`

- **gclId**: `Text`

- **refererURL**: `Text`
  The webpage where the contact clicked a link that sent them to your website.

- **applicantId**: `Text`

- **applicationId**: `Text`

- **ipAddress**: `Text`

- **userAgent**: `Text`

- **siteId**: `Text`

- **siteUrl**: `Text`

- **dateCreated**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

- **entryUrl**: `Text`
  The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

- **leadStageName**: `Text`
  The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

- **star**: `Text`
  String Value. Supports the following items: Yellow, Blue, Green, Purple, Red. Other values will be skipped.

- **rating**: `Text`
  This is the static array from 1 to 10

- **utmSource**: `Text`

- **utmMedium**: `Text`

- **utmCampaign**: `Text`

- **utmTerm**: `Text`

- **utmContent**: `Text`

- **utmKeyword**: `Text`

- **utmAdGroup**: `Text`

- **utmName**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField1**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField2**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField3**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField4**: `Text`

- **requestCustomField5**: `Text`

- **sub1_productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

- **sub1_paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **sub1_systemType**: `Text`
  Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

- **sub1_code**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

- **sub1_name**: `Text`

- **sub1_level**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

- **sub1_startDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub1_endDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub1_amount**: `Number`

- **sub2_productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

- **sub2_paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **sub2_systemType**: `Text`
  Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

- **sub2_code**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

- **sub2_name**: `Text`

- **sub2_level**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

- **sub2_startDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub2_endDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub2_amount**: `Number`

- **sub3_productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

- **sub3_paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **sub3_systemType**: `Text`
  Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

- **sub3_code**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

- **sub3_name**: `Text`

- **sub3_level**: `Text`
  Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

- **sub3_startDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub3_endDate**: `Text`
  Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

- **sub3_amount**: `Number`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "upgrade.chat",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addOrUpdateContactExtended",
    "input": {
      "matchExisting": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "overrideLists": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ignoreInvalidValues": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactXref": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "importType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "createUser": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sendWelcomeEmail": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "userPassword": "{previousStep.output_field}"

      "middleName": "{previousStep.output_field}"

      "workEmail1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workEmail2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workEmail3": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mobilePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "mobilePhoneExt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "homePhone": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "homePhoneExt": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workPhone1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workPhone1Ext": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workPhone2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "workPhone2Ext": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "home_street": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "home_addressLine2": "{previousStep.output_field}"

      "refererURL": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "applicantId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "applicationId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "ipAddress": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "userAgent": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "siteId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "siteUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "dateCreated": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "entryUrl": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "leadStageName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "star": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "rating": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmSource": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmMedium": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmCampaign": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmTerm": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmContent": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmKeyword": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmAdGroup": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "utmName": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "requestCustomField1": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "requestCustomField2": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "requestCustomField3": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "requestCustomField4": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "requestCustomField5": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_productCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_paymentPeriodType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_systemType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_level": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_startDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_endDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub1_amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_productCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_paymentPeriodType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_systemType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_level": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_startDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_endDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub2_amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_productCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_paymentPeriodType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_systemType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_code": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_name": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_level": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_startDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_endDate": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "sub3_amount": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---


### Add or Update Subscription

Creates a new subscription.

#### Input Parameters
- **contactId**: `Number`

- **productId**: `Number`

- **contactXref**: `Text`
  ContactXref have to be specified and correct to look up the correct contact

- **productCode**: `Text`
  Product Code (Unique product identifier). ProductCode have to be specified and correct to look up the correct product

- **paymentPeriodType**: `StaticDropdown`
  The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

- **hasRecurringBilling**: `StaticDropdown`

```json
{
  "type": "PIECE",
  "valid": true,
  "settings": {
    "pieceName": "upgrade.chat",
    "pieceVersion": "0.0.1",
    "actionName": "addOrUpdateSubscription",
    "input": {
      "contactId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productId": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "contactXref": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "productCode": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "paymentPeriodType": "{previousStep.output_field}"
      "hasRecurringBilling": "{previousStep.output_field}"
    },
    "inputUiInfo": {},
    "packageType": "REGISTRY",
    "errorHandlingOptions": {
      "retryOnFailure": { "value": false },
      "continueOnFailure": { "value": false }
    }
  },
  "nextAction": {
    "type": "PIECE",
    "valid": true,
    "settings": {
      "pieceName": "piece_name",
      "actionName": "action_name",
      "input": {
        "param": "{{currentStep.output}}"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

---

## Triggers

### New Subscription

triggers when a new subscription is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Lead

Triggers when a new lead is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters

---


### New Payment

Triggers when a new payment is created

```json
{
  "trigger": {
    "name": "trigger",
    "valid": true,
    "displayName": "Webhook Trigger",
    "type": "WEBHOOK",
    "settings": {
      "inputUiInfo": {}
    },
    "nextAction": {
      "type": "PIECE",
      "valid": true,
      "settings": {
        "pieceName": "piece_name",
        "actionName": "action_name",
        "input": {
          "param": "{{trigger.body}}"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

Trigger outputs available in next steps:
- `{{trigger.body}}` - Request body
- `{{trigger.headers}}` - Request headers
- `{{trigger.query}}` - Query parameters
